oai_dc:dc.dc:description: En el presente Proyecto de Investigacin, nos proponemos desarrollar un software educativo para la enseanza y el aprendizaje de los temas Interpolacin y Aproximacin Polinomial y Ajuste de Curvas por Mnimos Cuadrados. Adems, incluiremos en este software el que ya hemos elaborado para desarrollar el tema Resolucin Numrica de Ecuaciones no lineales. Se utilizarn herramientas libres en reemplazo del software comercial MATLAB usado en investigaciones anteriores. Para ello, en una primera instancia, se har un relevamiento acerca de la disponibilidad de las mismas con el objetivo de encontrar las que resulten ms adecuadas para el diseo de este nuevo software. Esto es, considerando especialmente aquellas herramientas que permitan disponer del software en lnea con el objetivo de crear nuevos ambientes de aprendizaje para obtener el mayor rendimiento en trminos educativos. Este recurso pedaggico ser utilizado, bsicamente, en el curso de Clculo Numrico que se dicta para las carreras de Profesorado en Matemtica (3 Ao), Licenciatura en Fsica (3 Ao) e Ingeniera Civil (2 Ao), teniendo en cuenta que esta tcnica tambin podr aplicarse a otras disciplinas cientficas. El objetivo final que se pretende alcanzar con la elaboracin de este software es el de disponer de un material didctico que permita facilitar el proceso de enseanza aprendizaje de las temticas involucradas en Clculo Numrico. Disponer de un sistema amigable con el usuario ofrecer un buen soporte al docente. En nuestra opinin, la combinacin de los elementos que provee la tecnologa informtica al ambiente educativo con los tradicionales es una buena alternativa. Un alumno que disponga de los contenidos temticos desarrollados a travs de las presentaciones usuales en combinacin con el software, tendr una mayor motivacin y, por lo tanto, lograr una mejor asimilacin de los contenidos curriculares involucrados.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Estrategia de gestin intrainstitucional para la mejora de la calidad de la formacin docente de carreras de la unse: un proyecto de cooperacin integrando las tic
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Figueroa, Saritha G.
Cordero, Ricardo D.
Velzquez, Isabel
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: formacin docente
e-learning
TIC
Innovacin educativa
Computer Uses in Education
Ciencias Informticas
tecnologa
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: La Formacin Docente es una variable fundamental a considerar en la mejora de la calidad de la educacin. Los Profesorados Universitarios y especialmente el Profesorado en Informtica de la Facultad de Ciencias Exactas y Tecnologas de la Universidad Nacional de Santiago del Estero (UNSE) asumen el desafo de la capacitacin de los agentes educativos en la integracin de las Tecnologas de la Informacin y de la Comunicacin (TIC) en la educacin. Esta carrera, incluye en el tramo final del Plan de Estudios la asignatura: Residencia cuyo objeto de estudio es la prctica educativa en contextos reales. Ahora bien, las TIC pasaron a formar parte de toda organizacin, y en cuanto a la educacin, han transformado las formas y modos en que se genera, gestiona y difunde la informacin y el conocimiento. La formacin docente no es ajena a esta circunstancia, por lo cual en diferentes asignaturas de la carrera se incluyen temticas en torno a TIC y se estn incorporando paulatinamente prcticas en el marco de Residencia. En nuestro mbito universitario existen inconvenientes para encontrar espacios reales en los cuales los alumnos de Residencia puedan realizar experiencias concretas en nuevos ambientes de enseanza - aprendizaje basados en TIC, lo cual genera una limitacin en la formacin de competencias. Dentro del mismo marco institucional, funciona una Unidad Acadmica denominada, Escuela para la Innovacin Educativa que ofrece carreras de complementacin curricular y carreras cortas, adems est ampliando su oferta acadmica y las modalidades de dictado de sus carreras. En este sentido inici la implementacin de un campus virtual sobre el soporte de la plataforma Moodle, para implementar cursos a distancia y complementar los cursos presenciales con instancias no presenciales, por lo cual necesita fortalecerse para integrar eficientemente las TIC como herramientas didcticas que permitan mejorar la calidad de los procesos de enseanza y de aprendizaje. En este trabajo se presenta un proyecto de cooperacin que integra las TIC como eestrategia de gestin intrainstitucional para la mejora de la calidad de la formacin docente de carreras de la UNSE diseado y desarrollado a partir de la problemtica local.
Eje: Tecnologa informtica aplicada en educacin

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: En esta lnea de investigacin se contina trabajando en la aplicacin de TICs en educacin, buscando resolver, mediante las capacidades transformadoras de estas tecnologas, problemas para los cules los mecanismos clsicos del aula convencional tienen falencias. Esta bsqueda de soluciones implica la necesidad de redefinir los procesos de enseanza y de aprendizaje a fin de dar cuenta, entre otros aspectos, de las nuevas formas de mediacin que surgen del uso de las TICs. Las actividades desarrolladas con anterioridad incluan estudios y trabajos experimentales relacionados con la transformacin de los procesos de enseanza y de aprendizaje en el mbito universitario que se extendieron en 2007 a otras disciplinas, al mbito laboral y al ciudadano en general. Como parte de las tareas se han analizado las dificultades encontradas al intentar incorporar las nuevas tecnologas en los mbitos mencionados, en particular el problema de la brecha digital, que se traduce en actitudes y capacidades no slo del Alumno/Usuario, sino tambin del Docente/Responsable a la hora de implementar propuestas que involucren la incorporacin de las TICs en Educacin (formal y no formal). Las nuevas experiencias abarcan investigacin y desarrollo en Laboratorios Remotos, en la utilizacin de Tecnologas de bajo costo en las aulas (tipo Classmate), en la incorporacin de los servicios de VideoConferencia sobre IP a los entornos de EAD, en la integracin de la telefona mvil a un entorno de EAD y en la capacitacin docente enfocada al uso de estas tecnologas en el Aula.
Eje: Tecnologa informtica aplicada en educacin

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper we present KRolog a Prolog based interface to work with simulated and real Khepera robots. The interface hides low-level robot-computer communication and provides a high-order set of predicates to develop programs in a declarative manner. This paper describes the software we have developed to support the hardware platform we use in cognitive robotics research at the LIDIC.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Problems and challenges for ontology integration in the SemanticWeb
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gmez, Sergio Alejandro
Chesevar, Carlos Ivn
Simari, Guillermo Ricardo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World Wide Web
Semantic Web
Ontology languages
Ontology integration
Intelligent agents
Semantics
Ciencias Informticas
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Semantic Web is a future vision of the current web in which the resources have exact meaning. The meaning of resources is given by means of ontology definitions. When these ontologies are defined in isolation, the union of two or more ontologies can result in inconsistencies. Resolving such inconsistencies in order to put the ontologies into mutual agreement is known as ontology integration. In this paper, we briefly survey the languages for representing information in the web and the SemanticWeb. We also review some methodologies for performing ontology integration. Part of our current research is focused into providing alternative representations of current standards for defining ontologies in order to overcome the problems associated with the traditional methods for ontology integration.
Eje: Agentes y Sistemas Inteligentes

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Diferentes heursticas para la solucin de problemas de mquina nica en entornos dinmicos
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: San Pedro, Mara Eugenia de
Pandolfi, Daniel
Lasso, Marta
Villagra, A.
Esquivel, Susana Cecilia
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: heursticas
problemas de mquina nica
entornos dinmicos
Intelligent agents
Ciencias Informticas
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Existen dos conceptos de importancia en el contexto de problemas dinmicos y en particular de scheduling dinmicos: la bsqueda de soluciones robustas y flexibles. El concepto de robustez de las soluciones se refiere a un tipo de soluciones que pueden ser usadas de igual manera cuando se produce un cambio en el entorno y manteniendo su calidad relativa. En el caso de flexibilidad, se refiere a la posibilidad de que las soluciones encontradas puedan ser adaptadas sin mayores problemas cuando se produzca un cambio en el entorno. En consecuencia, soluciones robustas y flexibles son altamente deseables en este tipo de contexto. Para un problema de scheduling se podran presentar dos niveles de dinamismo: uno de ellos establece un dinamismo en el cual el problema puede ser dividido en varios problemas estticos, llamado dinamismo off-line [33], [3]; el otro nivel de dinamismo apunta a estudiar el comportamiento de un algoritmo cuando se producen cambios en el entorno, pero durante el proceso de bsqueda y se lo denomina dinamismo on-line. Los problemas de scheduling off-line han sido estudiados por distintos investigadores usando para su resolucin distintas metaheursticas: Simulating Annealing, Tabu Search, Algoritmos Evolutivos y Ant Colony Algorithms. Pero pocos han encarado los problemas de scheduling on-line; para problemas de job shop [4], [5], [6], [7], [8] y para problemas de mquina nica [9], [10], [11], [12], [13] y [14]. Este trabajo presenta la lnea de investigacin a travs de la cual se pretende comparar los trabajos realizados hasta el momento sobre scheduling dinmico con algoritmos evolutivos para problemas de mquina nica, con otra metaheurstica diferentes como es el caso de la Colonia de Hormigas.
Eje: Agentes y Sistemas Inteligentes

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Use of Belief Revision

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Distributed ontologies expressed as description logics may define repeated information. To reason about concepts that these ontologies express, a possible option is to generate unique concept definitions in a different terminology or TBox. The creation of a new terminology from different ontologies need to be consistent, and expressed with non-monotonic logics to be further updated with new distributed ontologies. The model AGM of theory change seems to be an interesting framework to be studied in conjunction with description logics and generate a new non-monotonic description logics model.

oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Cobo, Mara Laura

Ciencias Informticas
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The accomplishment of systems with abilities to reason about actions and change and systems that can manage incomplete or not very reliable information with abilities to discuss or argument has been of great importance for artificial intelligence community. These two ways of reasoning were attacked independently, but they are complementary, since a lot of applications need of both, since all dynamic systems (dynamic on information) counts with uncomplete information and information that depends on events and time. The line of investigation suggested on this present work tries to achieve a system that can reason about action and at the same time can elaborate a discussion, i. e. intends to conciliate argumentative systems with reasoning about actions and change or temporal reasoning.
Eje: Agentes y Sistemas Inteligentes

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: En este artculo se describe en forma breve una de las lneas de investigacin que se estn llevando a cabo en el Laboratorio de Tecnologas Emergentes (LabTEm) sobre Algoritmos Evolutivos y su aplicabilidad como tcnica alternativa y/o complementario en tareas de Minera de Datos, especificamente clasificacin. Factores como el avance tecnolgico asociado al continuo abaratamiento de los costos, hace que los volumenes de datos almacenados crezca exponencialmente. En la actualidad, estamos en una etapa en la que no es fcil visualizar e interpretar los datos que estn almacenados. Existen muchos dominios en los cuales la acumulacin de datos es altsima y por consiguiente se hace cada vez ms difcil poder obetener informacin relevante para la toma de decisiones basadas en dichos datos. La tarea de Minera de Datos implica ''escabar'' en esa inmensidad de datos, en bsqueda de patrones, asociaciones o predicciones que permitan transformar esa maraa de datos en informacin til. En particular esta lnea de investigacin aplicar Algoritmos Evolutivos en la de la tarea de clasificacin.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Los sistemas electorales en el derecho pblico provincial argentino
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Atela, Vicente S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Derecho Pblico Provincial Argentino
concepto
caracterizacin
Argentine Public Provincial Law
electoral systems
Ciencias Jurdicas
Derecho pblico
sistema electoral
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Los sistemas electorales son parte del derecho electoral, constituyendo mecanismos que establece el Estado para estructurar la voluntad popular expresada mediante el sufragio y traducirla en representaciones pblicas. Los sistemas electorales se clasifican en: mayoritarios, proporcionales y mixtos. El derecho pblico provincial argentino como expresin de su autonoma poltica reconocida por la Constitucin Federal, permite que cada Provincia adopte su propio sistema electoral.

Electoral systems are part of the electoral law, they are mechanisms that the Estate use to structure the popular will expressed through the vote and to translate into public performances and public representations. Electoral Systems are classified as mayor, proportional or mixed. Argentine Public Provincial Law as an expression of their political autonomy recognized by the Federal Constitution allows each province to adopt its own electoral system.
Publicado en la seccin Derecho Pbico Provincial y Municipal

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Obligacin natural: de la nocin romana a la recepcin en el Cdigo Civil Argentino, con referencias al Derecho Civil francs y chileno
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Zini Haramboure, Paola Elisa
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ciencias Jurdicas
Derecho romano
Cdigo civil
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: El presente trabajo se orienta a desarrollar la nocin romana de obligacin natural, tal como fue expuesta en las fuentes y analizar su recepcin en el Cdigo Civil Argentino, explorando las notas del codificador y los comentarios de Daz Bialet sobre los manuscritos de dicho Cdigo. A fin de entender la inclusin del concepto de obligacin natural en nuestro derecho civil, se toma en cuenta el precedente del Cdigo Civil Chileno (tomando como fuentes las Leyes de Partidas) y la expresin de autores franceses, tales como Pothier, Duranton y Molitor. A modo de conclusin, se trata de comprender las razones que llevaron a Vlez Sarsfield a reconocer las obligaciones naturales en nuestra legislacin civil, examinando si dichas razones justifican su vigencia.
Publicado en la seccin Derecho Romano

The map of paid domestic work. The legal regulation of paid domestic work. The traditional justifications for the exclusion of domestic workers in general labor regulations. Intellectual property in digital environments
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Olivera, Noem
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ciencias Jurdicas
Derecho
Propiedad Intelectual

Licencia
nueva tecnologa
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: La propiedad intelectual es un tema dominante en la interseccin del Derecho y la Informtica. Los derechos del creador de las diversas creaciones intelectuales que dan lugar a la apropiacin de su explotacin econmica estn siendo debatidos. En este trabajo se analizan, por un lado, los desarrollos en materia de TICs susceptibles de ser protegidos y la ndole de la proteccin que tienen o merecen y, por el otro, la cuestin referida a la proteccin de los contenidos difundidos en la red, en tanto creaciones intelectuales.

Intellectual Property is a dominant topic in the intersection of Law and Computing. The rights that the creators of the different creations of the mind have, which allow the appropriation of their licensing rights, are under debate. This paper analyzes, on the one hand, the ICT related creations that are likely to be protected as well as the kind of protection they deserve and, on the other hand, the protection of content creation and dissemination in the net; such contents are considered intellectual creations.
Publicado en la seccin Derecho y Nuevas Tecnologas

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ensear metodologa de la investigacin socio-jurdica
The teaching of methodology in legal sociological research
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Salanueva, Olga L.
Gonzlez, Manuela Graciela
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ciencias Jurdicas
Derecho
Enseanza
Metodologa
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: En muy pocas carreras de derecho de las universidades argentinas se ensea metodologa; en la mayora se la ignora, no se ensea a investigar por considerar la investigacin innecesaria para formar un buen abogado. El derecho que se ensea y se trasmite en las sociedades actuales es una construccin de los seres humanos enraizada en sus conductas, ya sea para economizar esfuerzos, evitar conflictos y/o alcanzar el poder. Estas afirmaciones acerca del derecho lo ubican como un constructo creado por algunos para regular la vida social. Investigar su gnesis, los problemas de su aplicacin, el nivel de eficacia y el desinters de sus operadores por los efectos sociales que producen sus decisiones, son temas verbalizados pero poco investigados mediante mtodos y tcnicas de investigacin social. En este artculo se describirn algunos problemas que la enseanza de la metodologa tiene en las Facultades de Derecho en la Argentina y que se refleja en las investigaciones como as tambin, en la falta de reflexin sobre cmo investigar en una disciplina donde parte de su objeto de estudio es de carcter prescriptivo.

The teaching of methodology is rarely included in the syllabuses of Argentinian Universities. It is often ignored because the assumption is that it is unnecessary for the education of lawyers. The law taught and transmitted in present day societies is a construct deeply rooted in human conducts in order to save efforts, avoid conflicts and /or to obtain power. These statements on law define it as construct created by some people as a tool for the regulation of social life. Researching on its origins, the difficulties in its enforcement, the level of efficiency and the actors lack of interest as regards the social effects of their decisions, are issues which are often verbalized but seldom researched, applying the sociological method. This article describes and pinpoints some of the problems observed in the teaching of methodology in the countrys Schools of Law and it focuses on the lack of reflection upon how research is done in a discipline, such as Law, whose subject of study is of a prescriptive nature.
Publicado en la seccin Enseanza del Derecho
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Anales de la Facultad de Ciencias Jurdicas y Sociales

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Posibilidades metodolgicas en la enseanza del Derecho
Methodological possibilities in teaching law
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Amilcar, Mara Julia
Laguys, Mara Marta
Palacios, Leonardo P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ciencias Jurdicas
Derecho
Enseanza
Metodologa
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Este trabajo pretende enfocar la enseanza del Derecho mediante la indagacin de algunas herramientas pedaggicas que, ante la naturalizacin de prcticas tradicionales, se encuentran relegadas o ignoradas. De igual manera, pretende revisar algunos mitos, como la idea generalizada de que basta con sentarse, abrir los libros y leer para aprender Derecho; lo que justifica el dictado del tipo de clase magistral. Dicho enfoque surge a partir del curso conocido como Posibilidades metodolgicas de la enseanza del Derecho, dictado en el marco del Programa de Formacin y Capacitacin Docente de la Universidad Nacional de Mar del Plata, teniendo como desafo el de generar un cambio en la enseanza del Derecho, mediante la valoracin de la didctica como brjula del accionar docente, para superar as el enciclopedismo, la fragmentacin y el aprendizaje mayormente memorstico. Asimismo, se podr desarrollar de manera eficiente slo en nuevos contextos, como ser el aula, mediante cuestionamientos profundos y controversias genuinas que den lugar a una articulacin persistente entre fenmenos jurdicos y pedaggicos

This work tries to focus law teaching methods by researching some pedagogic tools which are pushed into the background or ignored due the naturalization of the traditional practices. Likewise, it also intends review some myths, like widespread idea which states that learning is acquired only by sitting down and reading books, being this the justification of the magisterial classes. This approach arises from the course known as Methodological Possibilities in Teaching Law, taught in the framework of the Programme of Teacher Education and Training of National University of Mar del Plata, and it has the challenge of generating a change in the teaching of Law, through the valuation of didactics as a compass for the teaching actions to overcame the encyclopaedism, the fragmentation and the rote learning. This new view could be efficiently developed only in new contexts, for example in classrooms, by means of profound questions and genuine controversies which can give place to persistent articulation between legal and pedagogic phenomena.
Publicado en la seccin Enseanza del Derecho
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Anales de la Facultad de Ciencias Jurdicas y Sociales

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Para un conocimiento de la teora pura del derecho
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pettoruti, Carlos Enrique
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ciencias Jurdicas
Derecho
filosofa del Derecho
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: El alcance y la importancia de la obra de Kelsen no puede ser comprendida cabalmente si nos limitamos al anlisis de sus expresiones, frases y afirmaciones, sin atender al mbito social, histrico, poltico y cultural en el cual el pensamiento kelseniano se desarroll. Entre los das 30 de septiembre de 2010 y 27 de febrero de 2011, en el Museo de Josefstadt (uno de los distritos de la ciudad de Viena) se realiz una muestra en homenaje a Hans Kelsen. En dicha ocasin se present el libro Hans Kelsen y la Constitucin Federal, en el cual se publican numerosos trabajos destinados a difundir la vida y obra de quien fuera el autor de la actual Constitucin Federal de la Repblica de Austria. Signado por una vida plena de vicisitudes que influyeron en su perspectiva jurdica, poltica y filosfica, Hans Kelsen no puede ser entendido slo como un jurista positivista ya que son muchos los ideales, sentimientos y valoraciones se aprecian en diversas facetas de su extensa labor. Este artculo que a continuacin se traduce concentra y refleja su vida y obra como jurista, filsofo y constitucionalista. Ha sido escrito precisamente por uno de sus discpulos y durante muchos aos director del Hans Kelsen-Institut de Viena, el Prof. Dr. Robert Walter, quien tuvo la oportunidad de disertar en nuestra Facultad de Ciencias Jurdicas y Sociales con motivo del Primer Congreso Internacional de Filosofa del Derecho, en 1982. ste es un tributo a su trayectoria acadmica. La posibilidad de acceder a este, su ltimo escrito publicado, llega a nuestro mbito universitario merced a la cortesa del Prof. Klaus Zeleny, Secretario del Hans Kelsen-Institut, quien es el portador de los derechos intelectuales de la obra del Prof. Walter. Aspiro a que esta tarea de difusin contribuya a comprender un poco ms el sentido de la obra kelseniana, ya que solamente conociendo su vocacin pura para que el derecho y la poltica estn al servicio de los altos ideales humanos, podremos comprender mejor el propsito de su Teora Pura.

We can not understand completely the sense of Kelsens work if we analyze only his expressions, phrases and assertions, without looking for the social, historical, political and cultural environment in which Kelsens thought has been developed. Between September 30th, 2010 and February 27th, 2011, at the Museum of Josefstadt (a district of the city of Vienna) an exhibition in honor of Hans Kelsen took place. On that occasion the book Hans Kelsen and the Federal Constitution has been presented. The book contains numerous papers about the life and work of the author of the Federal Constitution of the Republic of Austria. Marked by a life full of events that influenced his legal, political and philosophical perspective, Hans Kelsen can not be understood only as a positivist lawyer as there are many ideals, feelings and values ??that we can observe in various facets of his extensive work. The article below focuses in his life and work as jurist, philosopher and constitutionalist. It has been written just by Prof. Dr. Robert Walter, who was founder and director of the Hans Kelsen-Institut in Vienna, and spoke about Kelsens theory at our Faculty of Law on occasion of the First International Congress of Law Philosophy in 1982. This is a tribute to his academic career. The ability to access this last published writing, is possible thanks to the courtesy of Prof. Klaus Zeleny, Secretary of the Hans Kelsen-Institut, who is the holder of the copyright of Prof. Walters work. I hope that this task contributes to understand the sense of Kelsens work, because only knowing about his pure vocation for law and politic

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: El pasaje del hombre de la sociedad moderna a la posmoderna

posmodernidad

hombre
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Nuestro objetivo es reflexionar sobre el hombre en el cambio de paradigma desde la modernidad hasta la posmodernidad. A tales efectos, se realiz un estudio sobre acontecimientos histricos, conjuntamente con una seleccin de autores sobre el pensamiento filosfico en ambas pocas, para determinar cmo influyeron en la constitucin de cambios socio- poltico-culturales, configurando la cultura occidental del hombre actual. Utilizando el mtodo histrico-comparativo. La indagacin fluctu en el pasaje de transformaciones culturales y en la forma de produccin de las sociedades, a partir de la constitucin de la modernidad hasta llegar al sistema del capitalismo tardo y como afect la cosmovisin del hombre en cuanto a su sentido epocal.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Una reflexin sobre los valores jurdicos
To think about legal value
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Garate, Rubn M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ciencias Jurdicas
Derecho
filosofa del Derecho
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Uno de los temas ms discutidos en los ltimos tiempos, se refiere al tema de los valores no solo porque se discute sobre ellos, sino tambin, porque se discute si ellos deben formar parte de la problemtica jurdica. Nosotros entendemos que los valores tiene la pretensin de universalidad en sentido abstracto, por ms que se manifiestan socialmente dependientes de las formas culturales que adquieran. En este sentido no hay ninguna amenaza en la necesidad de establecer la universalidad de los juicios de valor; ya que estos encuentran su validez en una fundamentacin inteligible y racional. Los valores cumplen funciones de organizacin y equilibrio de la vida socialmente compartida; y slo pueden comprenderse por referencia a esa vida misma. La axiologa jurdica hunde sus races en la ontologa social, porque supone un momento de conflicto, en tanto que exista libertad humana. Nosotros intentamos profundizar la problemtica axiolgica desde el pensamiento de Carlos Cossio, la teora trialista y la teora discursiva, las que dan fundamento a nuestra afirmacin de que es justo aquel ordenamiento que se funda en criterios de igualdad jurdica, seguridad jurdica y bien comn. De modo tal que la justicia, debe ser entendida como correccin o justo medio.

One of the issues most discussed in the last times, refers to the values not only because we discuss about them, but also because it is discussed if they must be a part of the juridical problematic. We understand that the values have the pretension of universality in abstract sense, even though they manifest socially depending on the cultural forms that they acquire. In this respect there is no threat in the need to establish the universality of the judgments of value since these find its validity in an intelligible and rational foundation. The values fulfill functions of organization and balance of the shared socially life and they can be only understood in reference to life itself. The juridical axiology sinks its roots in the social ontology because it supposes a moment of conflict while human freedom exists. We try to deepen the axiological problematic from Carlos Cossios thought, the trialist theory and the discursive theory, which give foundation to our assertion that its fair a system based on criteria of juridical equality, juridical safety and common good. So that justice must be understood as correction or fair medium.
Publicado en la seccin Filosofa del Derecho

The purpose of this comparison is to highlight sources Eastern U.S. with the Instructions of April 13, highlighting the true democratic spirit Artigas, their originality in the previous post. and its success in matching the rules which required the will of the people

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: El golpe de estado de 1930 y las ideas corporativistas
The coup dtat of 1930 and the corporatist ideas
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gardinetti, Juan P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ciencias Jurdicas
Historia
golpe de Estado
corporativismo
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: En la Argentina de la dcada del 20 comenzaron a actuar, bajo la difusa denominacin de nacionalistas, distintos elementos reaccionarios que posean en comn una declarada aversin a los postulados bsicos del sistema constitucional democrtico liberal. Junto a ello, se verificaba el apego al tradicionalismo, el autoritarismo y el militarismo. Hostilizaron al gobierno democrtico de H. Yrigoyen y alentaron y se unieron a la conspiracin encabezada por J. F. Uriburu y un sector minoritario del Ejrcito. La xenofobia y el racismo eran asimismo un denominador comn entre ellos. Sin embargo, tenan tambin visibles diferencias generadas por los modelos europeos que tomaban. Empero, faltaba un elemento esencial en el rgimen posterior al golpe y en la mayora de sus inspiradores para poderlos calificar plenamente de fascistas: la vinculacin con las masas. Se trataba de un proyecto poltico reaccionario, autoritario, elitista y excluyente, que intentaba una reforma institucional de tinte corporativista. Tena evidentes vinculaciones ideolgicas con el fascismo, pero sin llegar a identificarse totalmente con l. El proyecto corporativista era defendido por C. Ibarguren y fue anunciado en el manifiesto del 1 de octubre de 1930: atacaba a la poltica de partidos y propona un cambio en el modo de eleccin de los diputados nacionales.

In the Argentina of the 20s, under the vague appellation of nationalists, began to act reactionary elements which had in common an aversion to the basic principles of democratic constitutional liberal system. It was also verified an attachment to traditionalism, authoritarianism and militarism. The democratic government of H. Yrigoyen was harassed by them and they also encouraged and joined the conspiracy headed by J. F. Uriburu and a minority of the Army. Xenophobia and racism were a common denominator among them although there were visible differences generated by the European models they took. However to qualify them such as fascists, was missing an essential element in the regime which followed the coup and in most of those who inspired it: the link with the masses. It was a reactionary, authoritarian, elitist and exclusionary political project that tried to obtain an institutional reform with corporatist dyeing. The ideological relations with fascism were evident but without identifying itself fully with it. The corporatist project was defended by c. Ibarguren and was announced in the manifesto of October 1, 1930: it attacked the party policy and proposed a change in the mode of election of national deputies.
Publicado en la seccin Historia Constitucional

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: El acercamiento entre Panam y Sudamrica
The rapprochement between Panama and South America
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ramirez, Lautaro Martin
Chamis Barahona, Ivn
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ciencias Jurdicas
integracin regional
Mercosur
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: El presente trabajo tiene objeto analizar las relaciones bilaterales entre Panam y el MERCOSUR y la posibilidad de arribarse a un acuerdo de libre comercio entre ambas partes, al amparo del Tratado de Montevideo de 1980 que da origen a la Asociacin Latinoamericana de Integracin. A esos fines, se har especial hincapi en los intereses de cada una de las partes de este nuevo binomio comercial, que abre la posibilidad a Panam de proyectarse hacia Sudamrica en tanto que al MERCOSUR lo habilita a instalarse en Amrica Central. Con ese objeto, se analizaran los acercamientos que vienen dndose entre ambos como tambin las implicancias que la creacin de una Zona de Libre Comercio podra traer a la regin y al reposicionamiento geoestratgico regional de ambas partes del Acuerdo.

The purpose of this paper is to analyze bilateral relations between Panama and the MERCOSUR and the possibility of reaching a free trade agreement between both parties under the Treaty of Montevideo of 1980, which gives rise to the Latin American Integration Association. To this end, emphasis will be placed on the interests of each of the parts of this new commercial binomial, which opens the possibility of projecting Panama to South America and the MERCOSUR to settle in Central America. For this purpose, we are analyzing the emerging relations as well as the implications of creating a Free Trade Area between them and the geostrategic repositioning of both parties to the future Agreement.
Publicado en la seccin Integracin Latinoamericana

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A molecular approach on sperm changes during epididymal maturation, ejaculation and in vitro capacitation of boar spermatozoa
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fbrega Coll, Anna
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Sus domesticus
Mascle reproductor porc
Macho reproductor porcino
Ejaculated sperm
Esperma ejaculada
Esperma eyaculada
Epididymal maturation
Maduraci epididimria
Maduracin epididimria
Fertilin
Fertilina
57 - Biologia
636 - Explotaci i cria d'animals. Cria del bestiar i d'animals domstics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mammalian spermatozoa acquire functionality during epididymal maturation and ability to penetrate and fertilize the oocyte during capacitation. Sperm quality results indicated that both epididymal maturation and ejaculation are key events for further capacitation, because only ejaculated spermatozoa are capable to undergo the set of changes leading to capacitation. Epididymal maturation is associated with a progressive loss of phosphotyrosine residues followed by a subtle increase after in vitro capacitation. Sperm glycocalix galactose, glucose/mannose and N-acetyl-D-glucosamine content increased distally in the epididymis. Fertilin analysis highlight that proteolytic processing occurrs mainly in testis for ADAM-1, and throughout epididymis for ADAM-2. Fertilin migrates from acrosomal region to acrosomal ridge during sperm transit from the distal corpus to the proximal cauda. All together we establish a basis for sperm assessment about the maturative status of the ejaculated sperm and, open new perspectives in the characterization of proteins markers of the sperm maturation and/or fertility.

Els espermatozoides de mamfers adquireixen la seva funcionalitat durant la maduraci epididimria i lhabilitat de penetrar i fecundar locit durant la capacitaci. Lanlisi de la qualitat espermtica de mostres epididimaries, ejaculades i capacitades in vitro, indica que tant la maduraci epididimria com lejaculaci sn processos essencials per la posterior capacitaci. La maduraci epididimria est associada a una prdua progressiva de residus tirosina fosforilats, seguit dun increment desprs de la capacitaci in vitro. En el glicoclix dels espermatozoides epididimaris augmenten significativament els residus galactosa, glucosa/mannosa i N-acetil-D-glucosamina al llarg del seu trnsit pel conducte epididimari. La fertilina s processada a nivell testicular (ADAM-1) i a nivell epididimari (ADAM-2) i relocalitza i concentra a la regi apical durant el seu pas del corpus distal al cauda proximal. En conjunt, en aquest projecte, s'ha establert una base per a lavaluaci espermtica del grau de maduresa dels espermatozoides ejaculats que obre noves perspectives per la identificaci de marcadors de maduraci espermtica i/o de fertilitat en els espermatozoides.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An empirical analysis of integrated management systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Simon i Villar, Alexandra
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Integrated management systems
Integraci de sistemes de gesti
Integracin de sistemas de gestin
Quality management
Gesti de qualitat
Gestin de calidad
ISO 14001
ISO 9001
65 - Gesti i organitzaci. Administraci i direcci d'empreses. Publicitat. Relacions pbliques. Mitjans de comunicaci de masses
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The main objective of the present dissertation is to empirically study the integration of management systems (MSs). Specifically, we aim to investigate how organizations carry out the integration process, which benefits and challenges they encounter during this process and whether and how they integrate their audits. Data for this study were obtained through a survey and a case study analysis of companies in Catalonia. The survey was carried out in organizations, registered to ISO 14001and ISO 9001 standards for quality and environmental management. Additionally, some detailed case studies are illustrated, revealing the process of integration as well as the benefits and challenges encountered by the organizations. Results are analysed and show responses on the levels of integration and the use of different integration strategies and methodologies regarding the integration of MSs. Some results regarding the benefits and difficulties of integration and about how companies integrated their audits are also presented.

L'objectiu principal d'aquesta tesi doctoral s estudiar empricament la integraci dels sistemes de gesti. En concret, l objectiu s investigar com les organitzacions duen a terme el procs d'integraci, els beneficis i els reptes que troben en aquest procs, aix com analitzar com s'integren les seves auditories. Les dades per aquest estudi van ser obtingudes a travs d'una enquesta i un estudi de casos d'empreses a Catalunya. L'enquesta es va dur a terme en empreses registrades, com a mnim, amb les normes ISO 14001: 2004 i ISO 9001: 2008 de qualitat i gesti ambiental. En lestudi de casos es revela el procs d'integraci, aix com els beneficis i els reptes afrontats per les organitzacions estudiades. Els resultats mostren els nivells d'integraci i l's de diferents estratgies i metodologies d'integraci. Tamb es presenten resultats respecte als beneficis i dificultats d'integraci i sobre com les companyies van integrar les seves auditories.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Las competencias laborales como predictoras del desempeo en una empresa del sector del juego
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Candel Ruiz, Mara Jos
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: competencias profesionales
desempeo laboral
evaluacin de personal
trabajo en equipo
SOSIA
casinos y sector del juego
Psicologa
159.9 - Psicologa
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
El objetivo principal de esta investigacin ha sido buscar predictores del desempeo laboral entre las competencias profesionales (siguiendo el modelo terico de Bartram), las variables sociodemogrficas y los rasgos personales.
La muestra del estudio ha estado compuesta por trabajadores de una empresa del sector de casinos de juego, a los que se administr el cuestionario de personalidad SOSIA, una valoracin del desempeo y se les evalu sobre competencias mediante una entrevista semi-estructurada.
Los principales resultados han sido: en cuanto a las variables sociodemogrficas su influencia sobre los aspectos concretos de esfuerzo diario y precisin tcnica, en las competencias profesionales la alta capacidad predictiva del Trabajo en Equipo y la escasa aportacin de las variables de personalidad o de valores. Por ltimo se discuten los resultados y se sealan las distintas repercusiones que tienen estos hallazgos en la gestin de la organizacin, sobre todo en seleccin, promocin y gestin del talento.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Narrative Voice and Racial Stereotypes in the Modern Novel: Joseph Conrad's Lord Jim and William Faulkner's Absalom, Absalom!
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Puxan Oliva, Marta
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: narrative voice; stereotypes; race; unreliable nar
estereotips racials; narraci no fiable; persuasi
Absalom!; veu narrativa
Lord Jim; Absalom
Conrad
Faulkner
82 - Literatura
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aquesta tesi vol demostrar que Joseph Conrad i William Faulkner, en les novelles Lord Jim i Absalom, Absalom! respectivament, reflexionen sobre la credibilitat de la veu en la ficci i del discurs racial per mitj de l'exploraci tcnica de la veu narrativa i dels estereotips racials. Nascuda de les crisis histriques que giren al voltant de les relacions racials, patides al si de l'Imperi Britnic de finals del segle XIX i al Sud dels Estats Units durant la dcada de 1930, l'articulaci d'aquests dos aspectes en les novelles permet una representaci de les qestions racials que s innovadora i ambivalent. Certament, la interrogaci de la credibilitat dels discursos, tan com en la novella moderna, porta a la sofisticaci tant de les estratgies narratives que exploren el problema de la fiabilitat en la ficci com de l's dels estereotips racials a dins de la narraci, entesos, doncs, com a formes narratives. s justament en l'anlisi de les correspondncies entre els aspectes histrics i els aspectes formals on la tesi troba la manera complexa en qu aquestes dues novelles expressen les tensions racials prpies dels contextos histrics que les engendren.

This dissertation intends to demonstrate that Joseph Conrad's novel Lord Jim and William Faulkner's Absalom, Absalom! explore the narrative strategy of narrative voice, on the one hand, and racial stereotypes, on the other, in order to reflect upon the credibility of voice in fiction as well as the trustworthiness of racial discourse. Emerging from the historical ideological crisis that involved race relations in the late nineteenth-century British Empire, and in the 1930s U.S. South, the blending of these two aspects allowed an alternative and ambivalent representation of racial issues in fiction. The interrogation of credibility, very common in the Modern novel, results in these novels in a sophistication of the strategies that address the problem of narrative reliability, and of the use of racial stereotypes for narrative purposes in other words, their conception as narrative forms. By paying attention to these two aspects, this thesis claims that it is in the analysis of their intertwining where we may find the expression of the historical tension born of complex race relations.

Per altres utilitzacions es requereix l'autoritzaci prvia i expressa de la persona autora. En qualsevol cas, en la utilitzaci dels seus continguts caldr indicar de forma clara el nom i cognoms de la persona autora i el ttol de la tesi doctoral. No s'autoritza la seva reproducci o altres formes d'explotaci efectuades amb finalitats de lucre ni la seva comunicaci pblica des d'un lloc ali al servei TDX. Tampoc s'autoritza la presentaci del seu contingut en una finestra o marc ali a TDX (framing). Aquesta reserva de drets afecta tant als continguts de la tesi com als seus resums i ndexs.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Research on Turnover Intention and Other Factors Administrators -Taking Kaohsiung City Government As An Example
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Liang,Chun-Ying
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: job satisfaction
job stress
leadership style
turnover intention
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
The Research on Turnover Intention and Other Factors of Administrators ~Takcing Kaohsiung City Government As An Example
Abstract This paper aims at researching on the present circumstance of turnover intention, job satisfaction, job stress and organizational style among administrators working in Kaohsiung City Government. Furthermore, it discusses if the differences of job satisfaction, job stress, leadership style and turnover intention exist among administrators with different working background. Through research results, the paper expects to conclude a concrete statement and suggestions as a useful reference for the government, administrators and other researchers.
This thesis mainly adopts questionnaire survey. There are five parts in questionnaire survey including personal information, job satisfaction measure, job pressure measure, leadership style measure and turnover measure. Distributing 465 questionnaires, there are 386 questionnaires availed. It results in 83.01 valid data. It adopts descriptive statistics analysis, independent-samples test analysis, one-way ANOVA and stepwise analysis to analyze the research results.
Through analyzing the results, the paper concludes the following statements: 1. Administrators mostly felt satisfied towards their jobs. 2. Administrators did not feel too much pressure from jobs. 3. The leadership style of supervisors combines assignment intention and concerning intention. 4. Most of administrators do not have highly turnover intention. 5. The marriage is regarded as the essential effect to administrators job satisfaction, job stress and turnover intention. 6. Age is regarded as the essential effect to administrators job stress, leadership style and turnover intention. 7. Seniority and degree effect on administrators job stress, leadership style and turnover intention. 8. Job position greatly effects on administrators turnover. 9. In job satisfaction, internal satisfaction indicates turnover intention. 10. In job stress, tiredness, self-esteem intention and disconsolate intention indicate turnover intention, too. 11. In leadership style, concerning intention can predict turnover intention. 12. Job satisfaction, job stress and leadership style can predict turnover intention.
Key words: job satisfaction, job stress, leadership style, turnover intention

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Feature Selection and Classification of Power Quality Problem
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Yi-Xing Shen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: TT
S
K
Probabilistic neural network
Multi-layer perceptorn
S-Transform
Power quality disturbances
Feature selection
Optimization
Fully informed particle swarm
K-nearest neighbor
TT-Transform
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: STT11--STT65S1162 PNN62 SNR=30dBSNR=20dBPNNKSNR=30dBSNR=20dBK20dB

With the rapid development of technology in the current society, precise electronic control equipment has been an indispensable role in our daily life. However, these control components are considerably sensitive in accordance with the quality requirement of power supply, that is, degraded power quality could cause malfunction and even lead to a permanent damage of equipment. Nowadyas, any component damage could cause expended damage easily due to the highly interated power network. Therefore, it is a critical issue that power transmission and distribution should be improved. First, this paper obtains time-frequency and time-time relationships of 11 types of power quality disturbance (PQD) by using S-transform (ST) and TT-transform (TT). By observing the ST and TT contours, 6 types of time characteristic curves and 5 types of frequency characteristic curves are depicted. According to the ST contour and the 11 types of characteristic curves, 62 candidate features are calculated for describing the PQD waveforms. Second, a probabilistic neural network (PNN) based feature selection scheme is constructed. Simultaneously, the fully informed particle swarm (FIPS) is applied to optimize smoothing parameter matrix and the leave-one-out cross validation is applied to estimate classification accuracy of PNN. The least influenced features are removed from the 62 candidate features in the condition of not degrading the cross-validation accuracy so as to reconstruct a desired feature vector. Finally, the PNN-based feature selection scheme is implemented to obtain new feature vector in the conditions of no noise, SNR=30dB, and SNR=20dB, respectively. The PNN, multi-layer perceptorn (MLP), and K-nearest neighbor (KNN) are tested. The results have shown that the PNN-based feature selection scheme can be applied to highten the classification accuracy of MLP and KNN in the conditions of no noise, SNR=30dB, and SNR=20dB, particulary in the condition of SNR=20dB. Moreover, the classification accuracy of MLP is the highest among the three.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Mobile Navigation System Integrating Localization and Recommendation Mechanisms
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hsu,Weichieh
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: localization
recommendation
mobile navigation
virtual reality
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Most existing museum digital navigation systems either lack a visitor recommendation mechanism or only have recommended navigation routes that lack any consideration of the needs and interests of individual users. Therefore, the navigation routes and timeframes are often inflexible, and these systems cannot recommend suitable exhibits and tour routes according to the users backgrounds and needs. This paper proposed a mobile navigation system that combines localization and recommendation mechanism. In addition to providing clear navigation suggestions according to the needs of the user, the system could analyze the location and time of the users and attempt to determine the potential interests of the users before actively recommending suitable navigation routes and timeframes through the use of hybrid filtering, so that realizing personalized and diversified navigation.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Internal Control and Earnings Management
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: LEE,CHIA-LIN
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Internal Control
Earnings Management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Kothari et al.(2005)Modified Jones Model
1.; 2.;3.Jones Model;4./;5.

The purpose of this study is to examine the effect of internal control on earnings management. This study adopts discretionary accruals based on Kothari et al. (2005) cross-sectional Modified Jones Model to proxy earnings management. Furthermore, this study uses the penalty cases for internal control weakness announced by the Financial Supervisory Commission to proxy internal control weakness. The empirical results show that the absolute discretionary accruals of firms with worse internal control are higher than that of firms with better internal control. This study performs several additional tests including replacing the weak internal control variable by the amount of the penalty due to weak internal control, the frequency of the penalty due to weak internal control tests, and adding corporate governance variable, the electronics industry dummy variable test, and listing type dummy variable test, positive/negative discretionary accruals tests. The empirical results of these additional tests are consistent with the main test results.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Asset Impairments, Corporate Governance and the Timeliness of Financial Reports
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Chao,Mei-Feng
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Asset Impairments, Corporate Governance, Timeliness of Financial Reports
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The goal of this study is aimed at exploring the effect of firms asset impairments and corporate governance on the financial report lag. The sample firms include firms listed on the Taiwan Security Exchange Corporation and GreTai Securities Market in Taiwan during 2004-2010. The empirical findings of this study are as following: 1.The cross-product term between asset impairments dummy variable and corporate governance dummy variable is significantly negative- associatied with the financial report lag. Furthermore, the cross-product term between asset impairments variable and corporate governance dummy variable is also significantly negative-associatied with the financial report lag. 2.In the sensitivity test, replaceing asset impairments by net asset impairments and repeating the above regression tests, this study gains similar results. The conclusion is that good corporate governance will reduce the bad effect of asset impairments on the timeliness of financial reports.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The study of applying lean production management to improve the operating performance of the tool machine
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wu, Sheng-Hsing
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tool Machine
Lean Production
JIT
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: PDCA

With time changes, machine tool industry is still very active and important in Taiwan. Although this territory has been expanded internationally, many players in this market have overlooked the importance of efficiency and capital allocation. One of the main factors is that while many manufacturers receiving orders, they have ignored the losses that might occur if the production is not running smoothly. Especially during financial turmoil with less order significantly, management has to ensure that production line would be more efficient to shorten the process delivery time to maintain competitiveness in the international market. Situations such as excess materials and finished goods, narrow capital to be funded, efficient internal control to the production line while waiting for materials supply could be well managed with the coordination from the suppliers and the manufacturers. I would lie to use this opportunity to look into this few areas and improve them and enable every staff member could enhance their strength and avoid spending unnecessary costs. I have explored a few areas in this research such as reduce unnecessary waste, shortened the working hour and staff could control the production line more accurately, the way PDCA could import the concept of JIT in the future, increase the entire operation and ensure smoother communication among sales, R&D and production departments and ultimately deliver products to customer in shorter time required.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Non-linear Short-run Adjustments Between the REITs and Stock Indices in the US and Australia
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hsiung Hsiao Sze
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: REITs
Granger
GARCH
US
Australia
REITs
STVECM
Structure Break Cointegration
Nonlinear Granger Causality
GARCH
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Gregory and Hansen (1996)REITsREITsGARCH(STVECM)REITsREITsREITsREITsHiemstra and Jones (1994)GrangerREITsREITs REITsREITsREITsSTVECMS&P500REITsREITsSTVECM()REITs()REITs(REITs)STVECMREITsS&P500STVECMREITsREITsREITsGrangerREITsSTVARREITsSTVECM(STVAR)()REITsREITsREITsREITs

This study uses the residual-based cointegration test with structure break which allows that the structure break of time-series variables are determined by the self-model proposed by Gregory and Hansen(1996) to examine whether there exists the non-linear structure break co-integration between the REIT indices and corresponding stock indices in the US and Australia and between the REITs indices in the US and those in the Australia. Moreover, we employ the smooth transition vector error correction model(STVECM) included GARCH to separately explore the adjustment efficiencies of the short-run REITs and corresponding stock return dynamics and respective RETTs return dynamics when deviating from the long-run equilibrium between the REITs indices and corresponding stock indices and between the respective RITEs indices in the two countries. In addition, this study adopts the non-linear Granger causality test proposed by Hiemstra and Jones (1994)to separately analyze whether there exists the wealth effect credit price effect between the REITs prices and stock prices in the US and Australia ,and which the price discovery exists between the REITs prices in the US and those in the Australia. The empirical results demonstrate that there are the non-linear structure break co-integration between the equity, mortgage REITs indices and stock in the US, between the REITs indices and stock indices in the Australia and between the REITs indices in the US and the Australia and between the REITs indices in US and those in the Australia. When large positive and negative deviations exist, the speed of adjustment of the US S&p500 Stock indices reverting to equilibrium is greater than that of the stock indices. However, when large positive(negative)deviations of STVECM exist, the speed adjustment of the Australian REITs (stock) indices reverting to equilibrium is greater , and that of the Australian REITs (US REITs)indices for reversion is greater. Then, the speeds of adjustment in reverting to equilibrium of the large positive and negative deviations in STVECM between the US mortgage REITs indices and S&P500 stock indices are equal, while they are unequal between the US equity REITs indices and S&P500 stock indices, between the Australian REITs indices, and between the REITs indices in the US and those in the Australia. The results of non-linear Granger causality test find that , except that there find that, except that there exists the mutual effects between the US ALL REITs indices of the large negative return regimes in STVAR, there are the credit price effects between US each type REITs indices and the stock indices regardless of the large positive or negative deviation (or return) regimes in STVECM(or STVAR). However ,there exists the mutual effects of the REITs and stock markets in the Australia. In addition ,there is the leading relationship of the US REITs indices rather than Australian REITs indices.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Analysis and Management Strategies of Express Delivery by Air Smuggling Act in Tao-yuan International Airport
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Liao Tsung Yu
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Express delivery by Air
Customs clearance
Customs brokers
Smuggling
Anti-smuggling
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Due to shelf life of products and market competition; just-in-time is required badly. For strengthen national competitiveness at the end of Cold War, 1991. Countries are engaged in developing their economy. Thus international business and trade are thriving. To follow this trend Customs Clearance and Declaration Simplify are the real practice in Taiwan responds to the demand. Express Hub Unit and Simplified Declaration System are established from 1995 to 2000. Express delivery has become the main channel in trade flows which shows on the number growth on customs declaration gradually. A high degree of Liberalization of international trade can be beneficial to the legitimate trade between countries, and also provide new way used by the unscrupulous businessman. According to the statistics, it reveal the smuggler take advantage of the convenience the other kind of accomplice , up to 98.48 percent smuggling has been seizure at cargo terminal at Tao-yuan International airport over past decade. The occurrence of a few cases has subtle correlation between customs broker and their operator. It is implicit there are gaps in customs clearance site that used by indecent person. Im worried about the express hub unit more than other cargo reservoir area, because of its characteristic which highly depend on customs broker industry. Simplified tariff and trade policy and anti-smuggling action on border are two ends of a leverage, every little movement will cause the other end a considerable impact directly. The simplify procedures of customs clearance are solid policy which means the period of goods stay in warehouse will shorter afterward. Thus the more simplified procedures the less time for examination. In order to maximize the ant-smuggling effects, to rule out the existence of job-site gaps, to eliminate the lawless practice by person of interest, a comprehensive review in advance is necessary. To make sure the law enforcement exercise and substantial inspection without interruption, and X-ray image interpretation concernedly is not only series issue of authorities but also the main purpose of study expected to achieve. Research of the problem of smuggling is a varied orientation, this study focus on the cases that customs brokers are involved smuggling is a kind intelligent crime skillfully designed with characteristic that evidence is not easy to collect and inspection is not easy to substantiate. Therefor ours study is scheduled to three direction, case study, documentary search and depth interview for mutual analysis, by which we obtain the detail from policeman and senior law enforcement officer who follow the case, statement from foreign company and competent customs officer in change etc. to reconstruct scenario of the job site into real approach, the existence of gap against ant-smuggling, at the same time and acquire professional advice on solving the problem. By analysis of interviews, graduate students separate the problem into three categories traditional practices, systemic defects" and "customs broker Management, By collate and correct the specific feasible remedies offered by the altruistic respondents, I hope it can break through the bottleneck of crime prevention and breakdown the smuggling activities at the gate of country effectively.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: (TRIZ)
A TRIZ Approach to Business Management Formulation-A Case of HRMS Industry
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bai-Shiang Tsai
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: TRIZ
Innovation Management
Market segmentation analysis
Contradiction Matrix
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A TRIZTRIZTRIZ TRIZ 3940 SPorter1985OperationsMarketing and SalesHuman resources managementTechnology developmentTRIZ

This study implements TRIZ to propose innovative approaches for resolving conflicts in a HRMS company case. The conflicts-resolving approaches are proposed in four levels, Operations, Human resources management, Marketing and Sales, Technology development. The results show that the introduction of cloud computing systems can solve the existing problems. TRIZ has long been widely be applied to solve engineering problems. However, few studies and practical usage were proposed systematically in management area. TRIZ introduction of a corporate management is feasible. This study introduces 39 TRIZ management parameters for approaching the meanings of original 39 TRIZ engineering parameters, broadening the TRIZ applications in management areas as well. The results showed that the enterprise product life-cycle close to the weak period, must find a new technology to replace existing products. The cloud computing model will be a great choice. The questionnaire results showed that a large number of units are not satisfied with the current system. These units can be considered as potential customers, in order to enhance market share.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Study on Relationship of Product Position and Design Strategy-An Example of Bicycle Industry
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Chien,Hong Yu
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: product positioning
design strategy
bicycles

positioning
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Taiwan has enjoyed the reputation of kingdom of bicycles but the competition of low price from Chinese manufacturers has placed the greatest impact upon Taiwans bicycle industry. This research studies how Taiwans bicycle industry utilized its own privileges to carry the procedures of design and inventions through the perspective of product positioning and design strategy and seeks out the causality of demands and supplies. Therere four purposes in this research: (1) It studies the present condition of product positioning type in Taiwans bicycle industry. (2) It investigates and analyzes the relativity between the product positioning and design strategy in Taiwans bicycle industry. (3) It studies the differences between the user groups of design strategy, product development, the demand of product design and the focus of product design. (4) It proposes the design mode of product positioning through inductions done on the relativity between product positioning and design strategy. This research applies methods of individual interviews and content analysis, and we engage into individual interviews in specific cases just to understand information as the product positioning, design strategy, promotional motivation, the design demand, developmental types and the design focus of the individual company. We apply the method of content-analysis to practice information analysis to induce the mode of product positioning and design strategy in Taiwans bicycle industry. The discoveries of research results are: when the product positioning is termed as image of artwork, the design strategy is enforced invention, the products promotional motivation would focus upon maintenance of top rank and fast flexibility while the products developmental type is an extension of present product that emphasizes upon functionality to feed the product demand of unique style; when the product positioning is termed as elaborate good, the design strategy is flexible technique, the products promotional motivation would be fast flexibility, market following and the basis of innovation while the products developmental type is an extension of present product which emphasizes its design on the exterior shape to feed the product demand of unique style, simplistic fashion and specific needs; when the product positioning is termed as fashionable quality goods and the design strategy is excellent quality, the products promotional motivation would be the basis of innovation while the developmental type is an extension of present product which emphasizes its design on the exterior shape to feed the product demand of technique innovation; when the product positioning is termed as one popular product and the design strategy is fast reaction, the products promotional motivation would be market following while the developmental type is an extension of present product which emphasizes its design on the exterior shape to feed the product demands of unique style, simplistic fashion and specific needs which are references for the future manufacturers.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Board Structure and Hedging
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hsieh, Wanchen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hedging
Board structure
Risk-shifting
Audit committee financial expert
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper examines whether risk-shifting behavior exists by reducing the hedging probability and extent of hedging in financially distressed firms and whether board structure can affect hedging decision to mitigate risk-shifting. Using the sample of S&P 500 nonfinancial firms over the period 2004 to 2010, we find that board size, number of audit committee, meeting number of audit committee, audit fees, financial experts in audit committee, and number (Percent) of independent directors have a positive effect on whether to hedge and extent of hedging. Furthermore, the active monitoring of board can enhance non-hedging distressed firms to hedging, which can protect creditors against risk-shifting in financially distressed firms. Lastly, we use a corporate governance index to test the strength of governance on hedging and show that the more strongly governed firms the higher probability and extent of hedging and less to perform risk-shifting. Overall, the results suggest that board structure is a good monitoring mechanism on corporate risk management.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An Effective Multi-Hop Broadcast Control for Alert Message in VANET
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fan, Cheng-Wei
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: broadcast
afety application
emergent message
collision
WAVE/DSRC
802.11p
NS2
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: multi-hop(Broadcast Control Unite, BCU)WAVE/802.11pNS2

In recent years, vehicle safety application has played a more important role in Vehicle ad-hoc network (VANET). Multi-hop broadcast method is widely used in these applications to propagate emergent messages to surrounding vehicles. However, it will lead to higher packet loss rate and transmission latency while massive emergent packets make data collision occurs frequently. This paper proposes a position base broadcast module, named Broad Control Unit (BCUnit), in order to reduce the re-broadcast nodes and minimize emergent message conflict. This module can be easily implemented to WAVE/DSRC devices without any additional transmission overhead and explicit coordination among vehicles. The simulation results show significant progress in multi-hop delay.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Story of Being Alone - Life Resilience of Solitude Narrative Research
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hu, Yi-Yuan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: solitude
resilience
narrative research
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This research is emphasized at the process of how the life resilience develop through the conflict and what kind of influence occur in the interaction between the person and interpersonal and social context through this development. This research uses the narrative research as the research method and the participant observation and unstructured interviews are used as data collection methods in this research. There is one research participant for the case study to conduct a narrative story based on the point of view of resilience. The results of this research are described below. In Yao-yigns story, when she got stuck, the resilience of solitude developed through three stages. The first stage is that solitude helps release negative emotions. The second stage is that the creativity of solitude helps reframe the problem. The third stage is that the positive freedom of solitude promote the new positive development. Interpersonal relationship and social context is the field where the life resilience can be implemented and then these stimulus become the input which is understood in solitude time; also it produces some expansion, empower, exam or correct. From the point of view of the resilience with ecological and developmental thoughts, the resilience which keeps on expanding and developing is always going back and forth between interpersonal relationship and social context. At the last part, the researcher discussed and gave suggestions based on the results of the research.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Meaning of Their Migration Choices: the Case of Myanmar -Chinese Migrants in Taiwan in the 1990s
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Peng, Nini
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Myanmar-Chinese
Overseas Chinese Students from Myanmar
Overseas Chinese Education policy
Migration
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 1990 195019601988199019901990 :Taylor 2001Giddens 2005Appadurai 1996Anderson 1999

This research focuses on the Myanmar-Chinese migrants in Taiwan in the 1990s, aiming to examine their choices to migrate to Taiwan. An early migration wave of Myanmar-Chinese to Taiwan was brought by socio-economic impacts in Myanmar in the 1950s and 1960s. In 1988, there occurred a huge national anti-government protest in Myanmar. Control of the country was been handed over to a new military junta. Following 1990 the new military regime implemented an internal and external open-door policy in order to improve the economic development in Myanmar, but the failure of the new military regime to curb the long standing crucial human right issues in Myanmar caused international economic sanctions against Myanmar. The continuous deterioration of educational and economic environment in Myanmar contributed to pushing out those young people, who were seeking higher education and better work opportunities. Most Ethnic Chinese choose to migrate to Taiwan. This research further investigated the meaning of motives and intention of voluntary Myanmar-Chinese migrants in Taiwan in the 1990s. The interview results showed that the motives and intention of informal migration to Taiwan through the Taiwan Overseas Chinese education policy to achieve work opportunities in Taiwan, Taiwan as a spring board to U.S, for further education, return to imagined fatherland, follow the steps of the others, and familys urging. In the other words, the meaning of their motives and intention of migration choices, is a kind of Instrumental rationality (Taylor 2001), consisted of Imagined modernities (Giddens 2005; Appaduria 1996), or Imagined community (Anderson 1999).
