oai_dc:dc.dc:description: En este trabajo presentamos la implementacin de componentes para un plug-in de Eclipse que permite la visualizacin del Modelo de Byrd de depuracin de programas lgicos sobre el cdigo fuente de los programas. La depuracin en el cdigo fuente es una caracterstica esencial en un entorno de programacin moderno para el lenguaje Prolog. Este trabajo contribuye en el creacin de un entorno de programacin visual de cdigo abierto para Prolog.
Eje: Ingeniera de software y base de datos
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: VIII Workshop de Investigadores en Ciencias de la Computacin

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Procesamiento de consultas espacio-temporales sobre un ndice eficiente
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dorzn, Mara Gisela
Gmez Barroso, Juan G.
Gagliardi, Edilma Olinda
Gutirrez Retamal, Gilberto A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bases de datos espacio-temporales
mtodos de acceso espacio-temporal
SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
Ciencias Informticas
base de datos
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Las Bases de Datos Espacio-Temporales permiten almacenar y consultar los cambios de posicin, forma y/o tamao de objetos a lo largo del tiempo. Para responder muchas consultas que involucran predicados espacio-temporales, es fundamental contar con mtodos de acceso que permitan seleccionar los objetos que forman parte de la respuesta en forma eficiente. Entre los diferentes tipos de consultas espacio-temporales, los ms considerados, en general, son TimeSlice, Eventos, Intervalo y Trayectoria. En la literatura afn, podemos encontrar una gran variedad de mtodos, los cuales intentan optimizar el desempeo de las consultas, pero siempre apuntando a un subconjunto de las antes mencionadas. Como objetivo de nuestra investigacin, nos propusimos buscar un mtodo que fuera propicio para resolver estos cuatro tipos de consultas, sin aumentar la complejidad espaciotemporal. Por ello, nos dedicamos al estudio y diseo de una estructura de datos, la que llamamos D*R-Tree, y de sus respectivos algoritmos de consulta, de la cual mediante evaluaciones experimentales ya hemos obtenido resultados, logrando obtener un mejor desempeo respecto de una estructura similar de comparacin.
Eje: Ingeniera de software y base de datos
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: VIII Workshop de Investigadores en Ciencias de la Computacin

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Propuestas heursticas para consultas a R-Tree
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gagliardi, Edilma Olinda
Gomez, Juan E.
Gutirrez Retamal, Gilberto A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ndices espaciales
consultas espaciales
procesamiento de consultas espaciales
acceso multidimensional
bases de datos espaciales
SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
Ciencias Informticas
base de datos
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: El avance tecnolgico y la cantidad de apli-caciones surgidas en el campo de las bases de datos espaciales, provocaron que las in-vestigaciones en torno a la resolucin de consultas de tipo espacial, se profundizaran a fin de mejorar el desempeo de las mis-mas. En nuestro trabajo de investigacin tenemos un rea dedicada al estudio de propuestas para resolver eficientemente consultas a ndices R-trees, considerando atributos derivados de la geometra de los objetos espaciales. Nuestro especial inters en este tipo de ndi-ces se debe a que es un mtodo de acceso estndar para las bases de datos espaciales, elegido por la mayora de los Sistemas de Administracin de Bases de Datos.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Towards the verification of RAISE specifications through Model Checking
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Perna, Juan I.
George, Chris W.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Model Checking
RAISE
formal methods
verification techniques
SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
Ciencias Informticas
base de datos
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ensuring the correctness of a given software component has become a crucial aspect in Software Engineering and the Model Checking technique provides a fully automated way to achieve this goal. In particular, the usage of Model Checking in formal languages has been reinforced in the last decades because the specifications themselves provide an abstraction of the problem under study (whether created by abstraction from the software or by hand) and the properties validated at the specification level can be warrantied to be preserved until implementation. In this paper we focus on the main issues for adding Model Checking functionalities to the RAISE specification language and present the most important characteristics of our current approach for doing so. An outline of the main issues and problems faced in the process and possible ways to solve them are also presented.
Eje: Ingeniera de software y base de datos
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: VIII Workshop de Investigadores en Ciencias de la Computacin

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Las redes mviles estn en pleno auge desde no hace ms de una dcada. Las redes mviles estn compuestas por dispositivos que no siempre poseen conexin con la red. Sobre los dispositivos pueden correr aplicaciones que, en caso de trabajar con otras aplicaciones de la red, tienen la dificultad de mantener sus datos actualizados y operar la aplicacin cuando el dispositivo pierda la conexin. Para facilitar estos inconvenientes se desarroll una herramienta que simplifique las tareas de la sincronizacin de los datos entre las aplicaciones y resolver inconvenientes que puedan surgir en la sincronizacin. Esta herramienta est dividida en dos componentes especficas: una que reside en cada dispositivo mvil que tiene la aplicacin y la otra en un dispositivo de la red que centraliza los datos de las aplicaciones. Presentamos la descripcin de la herramienta que facilita las tareas de sincronizacin entre las aplicaciones sobre los dispositivos de la red mvil y cmo trata los problemas que estas tareas implican.

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: La comprensin de programas es un rea de la Ingeniera del Software que se encarga del estudio y construccin de modelos y herramientas con el objetivo de facilitar el mantenimiento, la modificacin y el estudio de aplicaciones de informtica. En este artculo presentamos una lnea de investigacin que aborda esta temtica siguiendo tres pasos. El primero analiza los modelos cognitivos. El segundo estudia las herramientas actuales. El tercero examina la posibilidad de aplicacin de las tcnicas de comprensin de programas a los algoritmos de ruteo. El anlisis de los modelos cognitivos permitir la elaboracin de parmetros para analizar las herramientas de comprensin. El estudio de las aplicaciones existentes posibilitar conocer los modelos y estrategias utilizados por esta clase de aplicaciones. Finalmente, pensamos que la aplicacin de las tcnicas de comprensin de programas a los algoritmos de ruteo ser un aporte para la generacin de visiones innovadoras de los sistemas informticos.

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Los Patrones de Diseo ayudan a los desarrolladores de software a resolver problemas de diseo orientado a objetos que repetidamente ocurren. Cuando estos adaptan patrones a soluciones particulares, muchas veces elaboran modelos usando UML. Sin embargo, a menudo, UML no es lo suficientemente expresivo para describir patrones apropiadamente. Los perfiles UML (en ingls UML Profiles) permiten extender la sintaxis y la semntica UML para modelar elementos de dominios particulares. As como los perfiles UML extienden su vocabulario y los patrones de diseo definen para los diseadores un vocabulario comn; tambin es posible usar perfiles para definir un vocabulario de patrones en UML. De esta manera, los perfiles pueden ser usados no solamente para dominios especficos, sino tambin para resolver problemas particulares en diferentes dominios.

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: La administracin de objetos en movimiento ha despertado un amplio inters en los ltimos aos. Las bases de datos que guardan objetos espaciales cuyo tamao y/o posicin cambia a travs del tiempo se llaman base de datos espacio-temporales (BDET). El principal inters de las aplicaciones es administrar y consultar eficientemente las posiciones de los objetos en movimiento, basndose en el uso de una estructura ndice. Adems de considerar las propiedades de los objetos en movimiento (forma, tamao, entre otras), se puede requerir estudiarlos sobre diversos escenarios, con o sin restricciones, como as tambin considerar diversos estados del tiempo (presente, pasado o futuro). Nuestro trabajo de investigacin se dedica al estudio y anlisis de mtodos de acceso que almacenan y recuperan informacin de objetos cuyo movimiento se encuentra restringido a redes, no necesariamente predefinidas. Nuestra propuesta consiste en una extensin de la estructura [6], para que adems de la recuperacin de informacin histrica y actual de los objetos, eventualmente pueda predecir posiciones futuras de los objetos en movimiento. Tambin, vinculada a la consulta sobre trayectorias, en relacin a prediccin de informacin futura, se propone trabajar sobre redes no necesariamente fijas, haciendo incursin en los algoritmos de ruteo para la definicin de posibles trayectorias de objetos mviles.

base de datos
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: El sistema preuniversitario argentino tiene serias deficiencias, y una de las consecuencias se manifiesta en que el piso cognitivo y actitudinal con el que ingresan los alumnos a la Universidad es muy bajo y atenta contra el rendimiento acadmico de los mismos, adems de contribuir a la extensin de la duracin real de las carreras. La Minera de Datos abarca una variedad de mtodos estadsticos y computacionales para investigar la existencia de relaciones y patrones de comportamiento en almacenamientos electrnicos de datos. El Software Libre resulta ms adecuado que el software propietario para entornos acadmicos al ser ms fiable, robusto y seguro y de reducido costo. En este trabajo se presenta un estudio a travs de tcnicas de minera de datos que permiten determinar, a travs de un clasificador, el rendimiento acadmico de los alumnos ingresantes de la carrera de Licenciatura en Sistemas de Informacin de la Facultad de Ciencias Exactas de la Universidad Nacional del Nordeste (FACENA-UNNE). Se llev a cabo un estudio comparativo de diferentes algoritmos clasificadores disponibles en el software Weka, de libre distribucin, y se seleccion el que ofreca mejores resultados.
Eje: Ingeniera de software y base de datos
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: VIII Workshop de Investigadores en Ciencias de la Computacin

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Messaging Infrastructure for Electronic Government: Background, Rationale, Objectives
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Estevez, Elsa Clara
Janowski, Thomas
Fillotrani, Pablo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Software Infrastructure
Message-Oriented Middleware
Electronic Government
SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
Ciencias Informticas
base de datos
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Electronic Government applications aim to deliver efficient, seamless, customer-focused services to the public using various distribution channels. One of challenges in building such applications is the requirement to rely upon preexisting, often heterogeneous government applications. In order to enable communication between such applications, middleware software is required. In this paper we present a research line for formal specification and development of programmable message-oriented middleware, a foundation for infrastructure development for Electronic Government.
Eje: Ingeniera de software y base de datos
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: VIII Workshop de Investigadores en Ciencias de la Computacin

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mtricas aplicadas a la programacin orientada a aspectos
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Baigorria, Lorena
Montejano, Germn Antonio
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mtricas
Orientacin a Aspectos
Mtricas C&K
Mtricas Orientadas a Aspectos
SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
Ciencias Informticas
base de datos
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Encontramos muchos problemas de programacin para los cuales las tcnicas de programacin procedural o orientadas a objetos (OO) no son suficientes para capturar algunas de las decisiones importantes de diseo, que el sistema debe implementar. La Programacin Orientada a Aspectos (POA) es una tcnica que ha surgido para mejorar la separacin de las competencias en la programacin de software. La Orientacin a Aspectos (OA) se basa en tecnologas existentes, como la orientacin a objetos. Existe gran cantidad de investigaciones acerca de las mtricas de software orientadas a objetos y procedurales, pero no para software orientado a aspectos. Las mtricas de software son formas de calificar los diseos de software. Decimos entonces que las mtricas aplicadas a la OA son cruciales para determinar la efectividad de este paradigma como tambin de su uso en el diseo de sistemas de software. Dado que como dijimos la OA es una extensin de OO podemos ver como la aplicacin de esta metodologa afecta las mtricas utilizadas para OO y cuales mtricas deberan considerarse para realizar un anlisis mas objetivo del diseo de sistemas de software que apliquen este nuevo paradigma.
Eje: Ingeniera de software y base de datos

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aislamiento y determinacin de estructura qumica de principios activos presentes en Eugenia uniflora, centrado en los compuestos solubles en metanol
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Valle, Mara Elena del
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ciencias Exactas
Qumica
Plantas Medicinales
Epilepsia
Eugenia
Anticonvulsivantes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: La epilepsia es un grupo heterogneo de desordenes neurolgicos que afecta al 3% de la poblacin mundial. El 30% de los pacientes epilpticos no consigue controlar sus convulsiones con las drogas antiepilpticas (AEDs) disponibles. Existe por lo tanto la necesidad de buscar nuevas AEDs que sean ms eficaces y posean menor toxicidad, siendo los productos naturales una alternativa vlida como fuente de nuevas estructuras. Eugenia uniflora L (Mirtaceae) es un arbusto ramificado y globoso, utilizado en la medicina tradicional en Brasil, Paraguay y NO de Argentina, sus nombres ms comunes son pitanga y angapir Las hojas desecadas de Eugenia uniflora fueron secadas y molidas. 250 g del polvo fue extrado sucesivamente con hexano y metanol por maceracin en fro y se prepar una infusin y un cocimiento (segn FNA VI Ed.) del polvo del material vegetal al 5 % y 10% P/V, respectivamente. Los extractos hexnico, metanlico, la infusin y el cocimiento fueron evaluados de acuerdo al Anticonvulsant Drug Development (ADD). Los extractos fueron evaluados en su actividad anticonvulsiva, frente al MES test y PTZ test. El extracto metanlico fue fraccionado por distintas tcnicas cromatogrficas y las fracciones fueron analizadas por cromatografa lquida de alta resolucin (HPLC-DAD) y cromatografa gaseosa acoplada a espectrometra de masas (CG- MS). El extracto metanlico demostr una actividad anticonvulsiva importante, como as tambin la fraccin obtenida por precipitacin que present una actividad anticonvulsiva 50% efectiva, dando hasta los 30 minutos 75 % efectividad, aumentando el umbral de las convulsiones clnicas inducidas por la administracin de PTZsc. Se lograron identificar cuatro compuestos en la fraccin activa de Eugenia uniflora.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Notas sobre teora del Estado
Notes About State Theory
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Resnik, Mario H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: State
Estado
Ciencias Jurdicas
Derecho de los Estados
ciencia poltica
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: El autor considera que la comprensin cabal de cualquier formulacin de una teora del Estado exige conocer las condiciones sociales, culturales y polticas que constituyeron el clima vivido por cada uno de los autores. As como que cada formulacin concreta de una teora del Estado debe ser corroborable a la luz de las experiencias histricas del autor y de la sociedad dentro de la que fue engendrada. En este sentido, postula una revisin de la teora del Estado conocida en la Argentina con el fin de que de cuenta de la experiencia estatal de nuestros das y aliente a la formulacin de conceptos prospectivos constructivos.

The author believes that the understanding of any formulation of a theory of state demands to know the social, cultural and political developments constituted the mood for each of the authors. Just as each specific formulation of a theory of the state must be corroborated in the light of historical experiences of the author and the society within which it was generated. In this sense, presupposes a review of the theory of the state known in Argentina to that state of the experience of today and encourage the development of concepts prospective constructive.
Derecho Poltico

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Derecho a ser elegidas o el cupo femenino
The right to be elected or women's quota
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lapalma, Mara Monserrat
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: representation
elegibility
patriarchal culture
elegibilidad
patriarcalismo
participacin
Ciencias Jurdicas
Feminismo
integracin social
representacin proporcional
representacin poltica
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: En el marco de la temtica sobre la Representacin, cabe reflexionar sobre los diversos modos en que ha ido degradando el derecho de elegir en los comicios realizados. El ltimo vivido en junio pasado lo ha llevado muy lejos hacia atrs. Pero en este artculo me ocupar de otro aspecto: el de ser elegido. Un derecho conquistado en la norma implic por supuesto, hacerlo realidad y evitar que se lo tergiversara con prcticas anulatorias. En 1983 las mujeres empezamos a descubrir que se cercenaba esa parte del derecho poltico. Se inici as una nueva etapa. Empez, entonces, el emprendimiento por conseguir una cuota obligatoria en la cubertura de lo cargos electivos. Al discutir esa ley -24.012/ 1991-, hacia aos que las mujeres ocupbamos lugares en los mundos pblicos de lo laboral, de los derechos humanos, de lo acadmico, de lo artstico, de lo profesional, para que se nos siguiera considerando ineptas para la poltica. La cultura patriarcal, dominante, nos inclua a nosotras tambin. Nadie, ni individual ni colectivamente puede alcanzar un derecho si el impulso no nace de adentro. La elegibilidad de las Mujeres, institucionalizada por las leyes de Cupos, ha sido devuelta por el poder poltico al campo de la sociedad civil -donde naci-por los diversos modos de incumplirla, y los otros poderes dominantes han silenciado el fenmeno.

In the frame of Representation as a subject matter, it is worth to reflect on the different ways the right to elect has degraded along the elections. The last one, that took place this past June has carried it far behind. But in this paper I will analyze another aspect: the right to be elected. A right achieved in the norm that demanded to come true and to avoid distortions by means of annulling practices. In 1983 women started to feel that that part of the political right was being retrenched. This gave place to a new stage. Womens work was, therefore, directed to get a compulsory quota for the elective posts. By the time that law was discussed -24.012/ 1991- women had for years held sufficient relevant posts in public areas labor, human rights, academy, arts, professions- to be considered inept when it came to politics. The dominant patriarchal culture even included us. No one, neither individually nor collectively can achieve a right if there is no internal impulse.
Derecho Poltico

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: External memory in a hybrid ant colony system for a 2D strip packing
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Salto, Carolina
Leguizamn, Guillermo
Alba, Enrique
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: external memory
ant colony system
Patterns
Hybrid systems
Ciencias Informticas
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper we present a study of an Ant Colony System (ACS) for the two-dimensional strip packing problem. In our computational study, we emphasize the influence of incorporating an external memory, which store partial packing patterns, regarding solution quality and execution times. The stored partial solutions are used by the ants in the construction of their solutions to provide further exploitation around potential solutions. We show that our external memory based ACS algorithm to the 2SPP was able to devise solutions of quality comparable to that of those reported by an existing ACS but exhibiting low execution times.
Presentado en el X Workshop Agentes y Sistemas Inteligentes
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: XV Congreso Argentino de Ciencias de la Computacin

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Revolucin urbana y derechos ciudadanos: Claves para interpretar las contradicciones de la ciudad actual
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Borja, Jordi
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Revoluci urbana
Revolucin urbana
Urban revolution
Dret a la ciutat
Derecho a la ciudad
Right to city
Conflcte social
Conflicto social
Social conflict
Cincies Humanes i Socials
71 - Urbanisme. Paisatgisme, parcs i jardins
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
La Revoluci urbana i drets ciutadans, ttol de la tesi, no es pot adscriure a una disciplina acadmica especfica. Crec que predomina la Geografia Urbana, per tamb hi ha Urbanisme, s a dir intervenci sobre el territori, Poltica (no confondre amb cincia poltica), s a dir preses de posici al llarg de tots els texts, Sociologia i Dret (cal dir que van ser les primeres disciplines dels meus estudis universitaris) i sempre present una visi histrica. No cal dir que em sento molt ms proper al historicisme de Gramsci que al estructuralisme que va marcar molt (excessivament) a la meva generaci i que mai mha atret, malgrat que en algun dels meus primers treballs, de fa 40 anys, es nots la seva influncia.
La primera i la segona parts del treball es basa en escrits i reflexions dels darrers anys. En els anys 90 reconec que vaig prioritzar la dimensi positiva de la ciutat, influncia especialment deguda als meus 12 anys (1983-95) en el govern de Barcelona. Gradualment he recuperat el mtode dialctic i mhe centrat principalment en les contradiccions dels processos urbans.
La primera part s analtica i general i exposa la fallida de les promeses de la revoluci urbana de les darreres dcades. Es centra en la ciutat metropolitana o les regions urbanitzades. Inclou tamb una reflexi sobre lensenyament del urbanisme, resultat de la reflexi sobre el mster que he dirigit a partir de lany 2000 a la UB i desprs a la UOC. Aquesta part est feta des de la perspectiva relacional entre els poders poltics i els processos urbans en la seva dimensi socio-econmica a ms de territorial.
La segona part, a partir de lanlisi crtica de lurbanisme, est feta des de la perspectiva de la relaci entre espai pblic i moviments socials. La qesti de lespai pblic, vinculat al dret a la ciutat, ha estat el principal eix de reflexi en els darrers 10 anys. Els annexes (14 entre les dues parts) permeten presentar anlisis concretes que complementen els texts bsics.
La tercera part consisteix en un sol captol per molt extens (90 pgs.), es de redacci molt recent i reprn els temes del primer captol a partir de la crisi econmico-financera iniciada cap els anys 2007-2008, una crisi molt vinculada als processos durbanitzaci especulativa i a la borbolla immobiliria. s el captol ms poltic. Els tres annexes que completen aquesta part sn tamb representatius de lideari de lautor i han estat escrits en moments diversos.
He afegit un text complementari que ha donat com a resultat un segon volum de 300 pgines. Una mena dautobiografia sobre com he aprs el que s de les ciutats i he afegit una relaci bastant extensa de les publicacions (llibres i articles) i dels treballs (informes, plans o projectes, etc) realitzats al llarg de gaireb 50 anys. Lhe titulada Les meves universitats. Histria dun procs daprenentatge. El ttol, inspirat en Gorki, ja dna la pista de que no es tracta duna autobiografia intellectual. El meu aprenentatge ha estat ms al carrer que a les aules, ms en la prctica poltica i social i tamb professional de lurbanisme que en la recerca, ms en els viatges que en el sedentarisme obligat per les classes universitries. Reivindico com mtode de coneixement el que es deriva de la prctica social, professional i poltica.
Per crec que aquesta vida agitada no mha impedit llegir, escriure i fins i tot pensar. Sense menysprear altres formes de coneixement, com el que sentn actualment en el mn acadmic, reivindico el valor del coneixement derivat de la prctica i no admeto que se li negui el seu carcter cientfic, si s que les cincies socials es poden qualificar aix. En la reflexi sobre la prctica hi ha tamb base terica, mtode, treball empric i verificaci o avaluaci dels resultats. El text de conclusi es titula Lagonia de la Universitat i la responsabilitat dels intellectuals i s una crtica de la regressi de les cincies socials quan es converteixen en caricatures de les anomenades cincies dures.

Urban Revolution and citizens rights, the title of the thesis, can not be assigned to a specific academic discipline. I think it fits into Urban Geography, but also Urban Planning, that is to say intervention on the territory, and Politics (not to be confused with political science), i.e. giving points of view in all of the writings, as well as Sociology and Law (these disciplines were my majors at the University) and offers a historical view, present through the text. Needles to say that I always felt closer to Gramsci and his historicism then to structuralism that marked my generation (in excess) and never attracted me, although in my first works, written 40 years ago, one could notice its influence.
The first part of the thesis is analytical and general and exposes the failure of the promises of urban revolution of the past decades. It focuses on the metropolitan city or urbanized regions. It also includes a reflection on the way Urbanism has been taught, a result of my experience in the Master course that I directed at the University of Barcelona from 2000 to 2006 and later at Open University of Catalonia. This part is written from a relational perspective between political power and urban processes in their socio-economical and territorial dimension.
The second part is based on a critical analysis of urbanism and is written from a perspective of the relationship between public space and social movements. The question of public space, related to the right to the city, has been a principal axis of my thinking in the past 10 years.
The annexes (14 altogether), allow us to present a specific analysis that complement the base text.
The third part consists of only one chapter, but much longer (90 pages), that has been written quite recently and it returns to the topics from the first chapter now from the perspective of an economic-finance crisis that began in 2007-2008, a crisis whose roots are largely to be found in speculative urbanization and real estate bubble. It is a rather political chapter. The three annexes that complete this part are also representative of the authors ideology and have been written at different moments.
I also added a complementary text that turned to be a second volume of 300 pages. It is a sort of autobiography about the way I learned what I know about the cities. I also added a long list of my publications (books and articles) and other works (such as apports, plans, projects, etc.) produced in the last almost 50 years.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Resistncia a la insulina i disfunci endotelial sinusodal a la malaltia heptica per dipsit de greix
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pasarn Castellanos, Marcos
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Resistncia a la insulina
Resistencia a la insulina
Insulin resistance
Endoteli
Endotelio
Endothelium
eNOS
Fetge
Hgado
Liver
Disfunci endotelial
Disfuncin endotelial
Endothelial dysfunction
Cl.lula endotelial sinusoidal
Clula endotelial sinusoidal
Sinusoidal endothelial cell
Cincies de la Salut
616.4 - Patologia del sistema limftic, rgans hematopotics, endocrins
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
La malaltia heptica per dipsit de greix (MHDG) constitueix la manifestaci heptica de la sndrome metablica. La seva incidncia augmenta en les societats occidentals parallelament a la de l'obesitat. El dipsit de greix intraheptic pot conduir al desenvolupament de dany hepatocitari, inflamaci, fibrosi i cirrosi, per no es coneixen els mecanismes que promouen la progressi de la malaltia. No existeix un tractament farmacolgic efica per a aquesta malaltia.
La resistncia a la insulina, el fet fisiopatolgic subjacent a la sndrome metablica, condueix al desenvolupament de disfunci endotelial perifrica. No obstant aix, l'endoteli sinusoidal heptic s fenotpicament diferent al perifric, i es desconeix si la resistncia a la insulina genera disfunci endotelial en la circulaci heptica. L'adequada funci de l'endoteli sinusodal s necessria per al manteniment d'un ambient antiinflamatori, antifibrognic i antitrombtic en el fetge.
En aquest estudi hipotetitzem que a la MHDG, associada a resistncia a la insulina, existeix disfunci endotelial sinusodal que contribueix a la progressi del dany heptic.
Els objectius d'estudi van ser determinar en un model animal de EHDG si aquesta s'associa amb disfunci endotelial del sinusodal, els possibles mecanismes implicats, incloent la seva relaci amb la resistncia a la insulina, i si aquesta contribueix al desenvolupament de lesi heptica. Per respondre a aquestes preguntes es van caracteritzar les respostes vasculars de la circulaci heptica mitjanant perfusi allada de fetge, i es van estudiar els mecanismes que determinen la biodisponibilitat de NO mitjanant tcniques moleculars en fetge complet. Es van estudiar, a ms els efectes de la correcci de la insulino resistncia sobre aquestes alteracions.
En el primer estudi, desprs d'administrar a rates durant 3 dies una dieta rica en greix, aquestes van presentar esteatosi en absncia d'inflamaci. Aix es va acompanyar d'un increment del contingut intraheptic de triglicrids i cids grassos lliures. Les rates amb fetges esteatsics van presentar resistncia vascular a la insulina i, ms concretament, resistncia a la insulina a nivell del endoteli sinusoidal heptic. Aix es va acompanyar d'una menor capacitat de la insulina per fosforilar eNOS. Aquestes alteracions es van deure, si ms no en part, per la regulaci a l'ala de iNOS. El pre-tractament amb un frmac sensibilitzador de la insulina va atenuar la l'acumulaci intraheptic de triglicrids i cids grassos lliures, va prevenir el desenvolupament de resistncia a la insulina a nivell i va restaurar la capacitat de la insulina per fosforilar eNOS en rates alimentades durant 3 dies amb una dieta rica en greix. En el segon estudi, vam demostrar que l'administraci durant un mes d'una dieta rica en greix provoca esteatosi en absncia d'inflamaci i fibrosi. Aix es va acompanyar d'alteracions inclosa en la sndrome metablica, com l'obesitat, hipertrigliceridmia, hiperglucmia, hiperinsulinmia i hipertensi arterial. Aquestes rates van presentar un augment de la pressi portal de perfusi, a causa de canvis funcionals, aix com disfunci endotelial sinusodal. A nivell molecular aix es va traduir en un una menor fosforilaci de Akt i eNOS en els fetges de rates alimentades amb una dieta rica en greix. Aquests canvis funcionals es van produir en absncia de canvis fenotpics en les cllules endotelials sinusodals. Concloem d'aquest segon estudi que els resultats obtinguts en aquest estudi reforarien la idea de considerar la disfunci endotelial heptica com un esdeveniment preco que podria constituir una diana teraputica per tractar aquesta malaltia.

Non-alcoholic fatty liver disease (NAFLD) is the hepatic manifestation of the metabolic syndrome. NAFLD incidence is increasing in western societies, paralleling the increase of obesity. The deposit of fat in the hepatocytes leads in some patients to the development of hepatocyte injury, inflammation, fibrosis and cirrhosis, but the mechanisms that govern the progression of liver injury are not well understood. There is not an effective pharmacological treatment for NAFLD.
Insulin-resistance, the underlying pathophysiological feature of the metabolic syndrome, is associated with peripheral endothelial dysfunction. However, the sinusoidal endothelium is phenotypically different from the peripheral endothelium, and it is not known whether insulin resistance induces sinusoidal endothelial dysfunction. An adequate sinusoidal endothelial function is required to maintain an anti-inflammatory, antifibrogenic and antithrombotic environment in the liver.
We hypothesize in this project that in NAFLD, which is associated with insulin-resistance, there is sinusoidal endothelial dysfunction, and that this is relevant to the development of liver injury.
In the first study, we have demonstrated that after 3-days high fat feeding, rats developed steatosis without the presence of inflammation. Insulin resistance was present at the liver vasculature, and specifically, at the liver sinusoidal endothelium. This was accompanied by a reduction of the ability of insulin to phosphorylate eNOS. The conclusions of this first study were that vascular insulin resistance precedes inflammation, and can contribute to the progression of the disease.
In the second study we demonstrate that rats fed for one month with a high fat diet presented steatosis without fibrosis or inflammation. This was accompanied by alterations resembling metabolic syndrome, endothelial dysfunction and a decreased liver eNOS and Akt phosphorylation. This was due to functional alterations (and no structural) at the sinusoidal endothelial cells, without phenotypical changes occurring at this level. We concluded that endothelial dysfunction is a primary event that precedes inflammation in a model of NAFLD, and might constitute a useful target for devising new therapies for this disease.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Personalidad y afrontamiento en adolescentes con patologa psiquitrica: estudio en pacientes con trastornos del comportamiento alimentario y consumidores de drogas
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Magalln Neri, Ernesto Mijail
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Adolescents
Adolescentes
Teenagers
Trastorns de la conducta en els adolescents
Conduct disorders in adolescence
Transtornos de la conducta en los adolescentes
Trastorns de la conducta alimentria
Eating disorders
Transtornos de la conducta alimenticia
Abs de substncies
Abuso de sustancias
Substance abuse
Cincies de la Salut
159.9 - Psicologia
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
En la literatura cientfica existe una amplia descripcin de las consecuencias derivadas del impacto de la psicopatologa en la infancia y la adolescencia, pero existe relativamente poca informacin sobre la patologa de la personalidad en el adolescente, asociada a trastornos clnicos del Eje I y sobre el cmo afrontan sus problemas. El objetivo principal de esta tesis es tener un mejor conocimiento acerca de la patologa de la personalidad en pacientes con trastornos mentales, teniendo en cuenta su impacto a nivel individual y asistencial. Esta tesis se configura a travs de diversos estudios. En el primer estudio The influence of Personality Disorders in the Use of Mental Health Services in Adolescents with psychiatric disorders, se ha encontrado que los adolescentes con un trastorno clnico del Eje I, que presentan una situacin comrbida de patologa de personalidad en comparacin con aquellos que no la presentan, hacen significativamente un mayor uso de servicios psiquitricos, tales como ingresos hospitalarios (p <.001) y urgencias psiquitricas (p <.01). El segundo estudio Neither too much, nor too little. The dilemma of identifying personality disorders in adolescent patients with self-reports vers, sobre la identificacin de TP en adolescentes utilizando distintas metodologas de evaluacin, basadas en auto-informes y entrevista diagnstica. Se observ una pobre concordancia entre instrumentos (medias de k entre .02 - .42). El tercer estudio Usefulness of the International Personality Disorder Examination Screening Questionnaire for Borderline and Impulsive personality pathology in adolescents se centr en encontrar los puntos de corte ptimos para la deteccin de patologa de personalidad impulsiva y lmite con en el instrumento de cribaje IPDE-SQ, observndose una aceptable sensibilidad y moderada especificidad para la evaluacin de los trastornos de la personalidad en la adolescencia. El cuarto estudio Prevalence and severity of categorical and dimensional personality disorders in adolescents with eating disorders se enfoca sobre la prevalencia de patologa de personalidad en adolescentes con trastorno del comportamiento alimentario (TCA), desde el punto de vista dimensional, categrico vinculndose a travs del concepto de severidad. En el quinto trabajo Subtypes of adolescents with substance use disorders and psychiatric comorbidity using cluster and discriminant analysis of MMPI-A profiles, se replicaron hallazgos previos sobre tipologas de personalidad en sujetos con trastornos por uso de sustancias (TUS), aadiendo en este estudio el componente de la comorbilidad psiquitrica. El sexto estudio Dimensional model of the Personality Psychopathology Five (PSY-5) and facets in adolescents with substance use disorders and healthy controls. Se ha encontrado que la dimensin de Disconstraint es un buen predictor de TUS. Por ltimo, en el sptimo trabajo Personalidad, psicopatologa y estilos de afrontamiento: un estudio caso-control en adolescentes con trastornos del comportamiento alimentario, profundiza acerca de la relacin entre la patologa de personalidad en pacientes con TCA y los estilos de afrontamiento.
Los resultados de esta coleccin de estudios, sugieren que los trastornos de la personalidad en la adolescencia, aunque controvertidos en cuanto a su deteccin, diagnstico y tratamiento, son frecuentes en los individuos que tienen problemas mentales en edades tempranas. Una mejor comprensin evolutiva de sus efectos nos permitira identificar mejor a las personas en riesgo, pronosticando mejor el curso del desarrollo en la intervencin teraputica, reduciendo el impacto negativo en los servicios de asistencia, la clnica y las conductas de riesgo asociadas.

In the literature there is a broad description of the consequences of the impact of psychopathology in childhood and adolescence, but there is relatively little information on the association between personality pathology and both Axis I clinical disorders and use of coping strategies in adolescence. The main objective of this thesis is to provide a better knowledge of the personality pathology in patients with mental disorders, taking into account its impact at both individual and healthcare levels. This thesis is configured through seven studies (which focus of study is the identification of personality pathology in adolescence) and four specific issues around personality pathology (mental health use services, relationship with eating disorders, relationship with substance use, and coping). The results of this collection of studies suggest that personality disorders in adolescence, although controversial in terms of detection, diagnosis and treatment, are common in individuals with mental health problems at an early age. A better understanding of their developmental effects allows us to better identify people at risk, predicting the course of developing proper therapeutic interventions, reducing the negative impact on healthcare services, and the clinical risk behaviours associated.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: La escuela rural entre 1970 y 1990. Zona del ro Villahermosa
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Santamara Luna, Rogeli
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: escuela rural
Educaci
373 - Ensenyament primari i secundari
377 - Formaci professional
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pretendamos en 1991, cuando redactamos el proyecto de tesis doctoral, sentar las bases de una nueva poltica educativa para el mundo rural que pudiera ser aplicable a la zona del ro Villahermosa (Alto Mijares, Castelln) y que realmente sirviera para mejorar la vida en el medio rural que investigamos. Pronto nos dimos cuenta de que no bamos a sentar ninguna base nueva, puesto que la mayor parte de las propuestas para mejorar la educacin en el medio rural ya estn hechas y lo que hace falta es seguirlas. Es necesario, pues, investigar los factores que dificultan el desarrollo de las propuestas educativas favorecedoras de la educacin rural. Partamos de la semejanza en aspectos importantes que jalonaron el desarrollo de la LGE que supuso cierres de escuelas y concentraciones escolares y los que enmarcan la LOGSE con temor a la repeticin de los mismos errores. En el contexto de reforma era necesario conocer la realidad del momento y las alternativas para evitar los errores del pasado y as hemos trabajado -casi contra reloj- para finalizar esta tesis antes de que se promulguen todas las disposiciones complementarias de la LOGSE y se mate, definitivamente, con la escuela rural. Estas prisas explican, en parte, el carcter inperfecto de nuestro trabajo que ha tenido que centrarse en aspectos concretos para no dinfundir el esfuerzo investigador excesivamente. Sin embargo y pese al carcter incompleto de nuestras investigaciones, creemos que nuestras aportaciones pueden ser tiles para conocer la escuela rural, su historia y algunas alternativas actuales y demuestran que la escuela rural todava existe y puede seguir ofreciendo un servicio educativo de calidad y arraigado en el entorno. Con el fin de facilitar el seguimiento en la lectura citamos las partes y captulos de esta tesis. Tras una amplia introduccin donde se justifica la tesis y se plantean hiptesis y metodologa, se desarrollamos el contenido de la tesis en dos partes. La primera parte es una aproximacin al mundo rural y a la escuela rural. Se usan distintas definiciones de medio rural (cap. 1) y se define el concepto de escuela rural (cap. 2). Despus, en el captulo 3, se relaciona el mundo rural, los factores econmicos y educativos y la escuela rural en 4 pases europeos (Espaa, Francia, Italia y Portugal) comparndolos. A continuacin se exponen unas directrices de organismos internacionales sobre educacin en el medio rural (cap. 4). Integran esta parte los captulos de la escuela rural en Espaa y la escuela rural en la Comunidad Valenciana (caps. 5 y 5 respectivamente). La segunda parte se centra en la zona del ro Villahermosa. El captulo 7 es una aproximacin al medio natural, social, econmico y cultural, donde se evidencia la ruralidad de la zona. Acto seguido se expone la visin evolutiva de la red escolar de los municipios que integran este territorio, vinculada al marco socioeconmico y legislativo (cap. 8) y una serie de investigaciones centradas todas en la escuela rural de la zona, destacando especialmente la que pretende conocer la opinin de los maestros de la zona en tres pocas distintas (1965-75, 1975-85, 1985-95), centrada cada etapa en una ley (LGE 1970, LOECE 1980, LOGSE 1990), cap. 9, complementado con las opiniones de padres y madres sobre escuela y medio rural (cap. 10). Por ltimo, a partir de las investigaciones de zona y de los conocimientos generales sobre escuela rural se presenta un captulo de propuestas concretas de aplicacin en la zona de estudio (cap. 11). Cierra el informe un apartado de conclusiones sobre nuestro trabajo y un amplio captulo de bibliografa, que se completa con un Apndice documental al que nos referimos en algunos captulos. Ahora, 16 aos despus, la mayor parte de las propuestas siguen vigentes y el peligro que se cierne sobre la escuela rural vuelve a ser patente con las propuestas de cierres, concentraciones y agrupaciones que plantean las distintas administraciones autonmicas, por lo cual puede ser pertinente su publicacin y difusin. Animamos a los lectores a profundizar en nuestra investigacin para que sus crticas contribuyan a mejorar nuestro trabajo.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Evaluacin medioambiental del sistema integral de gestin de vehculos al final de su vida til.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Muz Marz, Carlos
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Anlisis del ciclo de vida
vehculos al final de su vida til
gestin de residuos
Projectes d'Enginyeria
62 - Enginyeria. Tecnologia
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: La realizacin de esta tesis doctoral ha permitido la evaluacin medioambiental del sistema integral de gestin de vehculos al final de su vida til en el contexto europeo. En su realizacin, ha sido necesario definir el sistema mediante la identificacin de su inventario, flujos y relaciones entre etapas y tratamientos, como punto de partida para determinar el desempeo ambiental del sistema. La evaluacin del desempeo ambiental del sistema integral de gestin de vehculos al final de su vida til ha sido realizada a travs de la cuantificacin del cumplimiento de los objetivos exigidos en la Directiva 2000/53/CE del Parlamento Europeo y del Consejo, de 18 de septiembre de 2000, relativa a los vehculos al final de su vida til, y mediante la evaluacin del impacto del ciclo de vida del sistema segn la metodologa del Anlisis del Ciclo de Vida. Tras identificar las tecnologas y tratamientos que forman parte del sistema integral de gestin de vehculos al final de su vida til, se ha detectado la necesidad de definir e inventariar el sistema a partir de los procesos aplicables a los residuos de los vehculos. La realizacin de un ambicioso estudio de campo ha permitido identificar los flujos de entrada y salida, las energas, el transporte y las emisiones asociados a la gestin en centros autorizados de tratamiento de 10.506 vehculos al final de su vida til. Adems de los datos de inventario obtenidos, el estudio ha permitido identificar dos tipologas de centro autorizado de tratamiento distintas: el tipo 'desguace' y el tipo 'desfabricacin'. Por otro lado, se ha analizado el inventario asociado a la etapa de fragmentacin, extendiendo el estudio de campo a dos instalaciones de fragmentacin que en conjunto representan la gestin de 283.000 t de este residuo. A partir del anlisis del residuo de fragmentacin, se han identificado aquellas tecnologas y tratamientos que, adems del comnmente aplicado depsito en vertedero, pueden ser una alternativa para la gestin de este residuo. En total se han analizado quince tecnologas y tratamientos de post-fragmentacin. Tomando como referencia el depsito en vertedero, se han expuesto e inventariado cuatro tratamientos fsicos y mecnicos avanzados (R-Plus/Wesa SLF, Salyp, VW-Sicon y ANL), un tratamiento basado en la hidrlisis, dos tecnologas de combustin (Co-incineracin con residuos slidos municipales y el Horno de cementera), el proceso piroltico denominado Citron, dos alternativas de gasificacin (gasificacin secuencial en horno rotativo y gasificacin cataltica) y cuatro tecnologas de tratamiento hbridas que combinan en parte a las anteriores (Reshment, TwinRec, Thermoselect-Process y SVZ Schwarze Pumpe). Finalmente, tras identificar los residuos y materiales que se extraen en etapas anteriores del sistema de gestin de vehculos al final de su vida til, se describen e inventaran las tecnologas y tratamientos aplicables a dichos residuos y materiales. En concreto, se han considerado el tratamiento de: aceites y lubricantes usados, anticongelantes y refrigerantes, lquido de frenos, bateras usadas, otros combustibles, filtros de aceite, zapatas de freno que contienen amianto, neumticos fuera de uso, plsticos y polmeros, vidrios, catalizadores, piezas y componentes, cenizas y escorias, inertes y vitrificados, absorbentes, materiales de filtracin, trapos de limpieza y ropas protectoras, otros disolventes y mezclas de disolventes, lodos y aguas aceitosas, y aguas residuales de procesos. Puede afirmarse que, la evaluacin del impacto ambiental del sistema integral de gestin de vehculos al final de su vida til ha permitido evidenciar la difcil cuestin a la que ste se enfrenta: "Qu coste o impacto ambiental puede asumirse para cumplir los objetivos futuros exigidos en la Directiva 2000/53/CE? "Qu debe prevalecer?

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Study of the Different Use of Insulting Words: Gender and Age as Social Determinants
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Liao, Hsian-Ya
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The present thesis is an attempt to investigate the sex and age related differences is the use of insulting words. The study is carried out on 600 Chinese students in Taipei. They are divided into three age groups--13-15, 16-18, and 19-25. Male and female subjects are equally distributed in each age group. They are asked to complete questionnaires. The questionnaires are disigned for different sexes and ages to choose which insulting words they would use when insulting people. The results show that the differences are significant. It means different sexes and ages will affect the use of insulting words. The results also show some changes in sex role. The sex role change is the process of social change. Therefore, the results can reflect the changing society.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Effects of Regulatory Focus and Fear Appeal on the Effectiveness of Advertisement: A Study of Helmet Utility on Taiwan College Students
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jen-Chieh Wang
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: none
Helmet
Advertisement effectiveness
Ad believability
Ad likability
Fear appeal
Regulatory focus
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: none

Wearing safety helmets on riding motorcycles has become a main concern in Taiwan. In Japan (2006), the death rate caused by wearing no helmet is 0.0057%; In Korea (2006), the death rate is 0.0131% and In Taiwan (2006), the death rate is 0.0175% (National Police Agency, 2009). But relevant studies concerning how regulatory focus and fear appeal succeed in improving audiences purchasing intention is limited. In this study, the helmet is taken to be the research object and an accomplishment is made to identify the effects of regulatory focus and fear appeal on advertisement effectiveness. The conceptual framework is developed by referring to a chain of literature reviews and hypotheses developments. An experiment by using 2 (promotion vs. prevention of regulatory focus) X 2 (high vs. low of fear appeal) is conducted. The results indicate that high fear advertisements increase participants ad believability and ad likability. Similarly, promotion focused advertisements enhance participants ad believability and ad likability. Moreover, fear level and regulatory focus interact significantly on ad believability and ad likability. As expected, these ad believability and ad likability significantly influence participants attitudes and behavioral intentions.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Program Execution Time Estimation Tool Based on Register Transfer Language
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Liao, Wei-Sheng
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Program Execution Time Estimation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Developing high performance programs is the critical issue of programmers. Before releasing a program to the client, programmers will usually evaluate the performance of the program and exploit the compiler optimization options to improve the performance as much as possible. This thesis develops a program execution time estimation tool based on the compiler intermediate language - register transfer language. By using program static analysis, the estimation of the program execution time can be performed with as few program executions as possible. From the observation of a preliminary experiment on the comparison of the estimated execution time and the exertion time obtained from a simula- tor, the average accuracy rate of the estimated execution time is 72.03%, and the average accuracy rates are very consistent for different compiler optimization options. This thesis also utilizes this program execution time estimation tool to upgrade the speed of the iterative compilation. By using a control flow pattern caching mechanism, a preliminary experiment shows that this program execution time estimation tool can significantly upgrade the speed of the iterative compilation.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Building an eBook Repository with Cross-Reference Bookmark for Realizing the Teaching Strategy of Knowledge Summary
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tsai, ShangTing
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: eBook
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: human-computer interactionuser-friendly activity eBookIT

Multi-touch technology works by using the touch components to operate activity of screen for users need. This operation allows users controlling components in a human-computer interaction way which can achieve the effect of user-friendly operation. Compare with the mouse control, the finger control on the screen allows users to clearly understand the current action situation. The eBook has a more diversified approach to render the book content. Compare with printed books, eBooks have more multimedia, such as images, videos, audios, and texts. The eBook is more lightweight and convenient than printed book. Through the internet, eBooks can get a lot of knowledge. Therefore, we use the multi-touch technology on the eBook reading and teaching strategy to produce the new type of interactive eBook which can achieve the purpose of teaching and learning. The system consists of two parts: eBook editor and eBook player. The eBook editor can quickly and conveniently edit eBooks without learning too much IT skills and reduce the gap in making eBooks for designers operation. Learners can manage the bookcase through our staircase-type structure and read the eBook through the touch screen. They can also summarize the focus knowledge by the cross-reference bookmark and the featured books. The mechanism can help Learners to achieve meaningful learning.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Video Retargeting Using Non-homogeneous Scaling and Cropping
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Yo, Wenyu
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Video retargeting
Image retargeting
Non-homogeneous Scaling
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Video retargeting is used to change the ratio between height and weight of original size and maintain original size of the saliency areas as possible. Although the efficacy of image retargeting is very good, there is a problem of video retargeting which must maintain the temporal coherence of video. Therefore, video retargeting is an ill-posed problem in image processing.
The proposed method allows solving optimized function to find the scaling factor map. Scaling factor map represents the scaling degree of one direction of each pixel (block) and then we can use the scaling factor map to transform the original video to the retargeting video with target size by per-frame processing. The optimized function includes visual attention value of video content and temporal information. Therefore, the optimized scaling factor map which is solved from optimized function can maintain two above character. Finally, we use the cropping method to improve the efficiency of the optimized scaling factor map. Based on the experimental results obtained in this study, the proposed method has better performance than the previous methods.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Efficient Active Learning Based on Localized Uncertainty Clusters
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wu,WangPing
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: clustering
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: There are many approaches which incorporate clustering into active learning for avoiding selecting the similar data points in the active learning. Yet, the traditional clustering methods do not consider increasing the accuracy of the active learning. There are two main purposes in this thesis. One is that more uncertain representatives of clusters are generated in clustering to increase the accuracy of the classification, and the other is that clustering with an unknown number of clusters. In our method, data points with similar in the local uncertainty, the small difference of coordinates and the large overlapped neighborhood will be collected into the same cluster. And the idea of certainty-based active learning(CBAL), which a local classifier is built by using neighbors, is used for finding the appropriate size of neighborhood. In our approach, the generated representatives can represent the effect of all data points in the same cluster to the classifier. Moreover, more uncertain representatives are generated, which will increase the accuracy of active learning. In addition, we propose a new clustering method which uses the value of local distance-based outlier factor(LDOF) to expand size of clusters and uses the distance measurement metric based on local uncertainty and overlapped neighborhood (LNC formula) to measure the similarity between data points. Finally, the experimental results show that the proposed method can select more uncertain training data in the synthetic dataset. And, in the UCI datasets , the accuracy and running time are also better.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Using Evolutionary Algorithms to Optimize Execution Time and Code Size in Iterative Compilation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Chou, Yanchuan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: evolutionary algorithms
multi-objective optimization
compiler
iterative compilation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Iterative Compilation NSGA-IIMOEA/D

Modern compilers usually provide a large number of optimization options to aid users to fine tune their programs for the best performance. However, applying such optimization options involves complex knowledge about compiler optimization, so most users do not have the capability to utilize these optimization options. Iterative Compilation is currently the most common approach to searching for the optimal set of optimization options for a program. There are several interesting performance metrics in compiler optimization: execution time, compilation time, code size, memory space, power consumption, and other computing resources. This research investigates multi-objective optimization of execution time and code size in Iterative Compilation using the popular multi-objective evolutionary algorithms NSGA-II and MOEA/D. The experimental results show that the optimization sequences chosen by both algorithms are superior to the ones generated by the random search algorithm and the ones corresponding to the optimization levels provided by the compiler.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Exploring confidence-based neighborhoods in outlier detection
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wu,Chiawen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: outlier
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper presents a non-traditional approach to outlier detection by consid- ering labels and data distribution of neighbors for every predicted data point. To deal with the problem caused by data distribution in outlier detection, we propose a method which is using local neighbors to build the classier for every predicted data point and then classifying the predicted data point which is outlier or not. A function of condence value is introduced to indi- cate how close the predicted data to the hyperplane for a SVM classier as the relative distance to its k nearest neighbors. To enhance the prediction ac- curacy, the appropriate size of nearest neighborhood needs to be determined. The predicted data points are classied based on the changing of condence values. To evaluate proposed approach, we compare the performance with six state-of-the-art outlier detection algorithms.We improve accuracy about 3% to 50 % in various data sets.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Impact of Rapid Transit Stations on Real Estate Prices in New Development Areas-Case Studies of Gangshan and Qiaotou Areas, Kaohsiung City
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lu,Tsungchi
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Rapid transit station
Housing prices
Spatial analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study analyzes the impact of rapid transit stations (Metro Stations) on real estate prices in new development areas-case studies of Gangshan and Qiaotou areas,the data comes from housing transaction price database from 2007 to 2010,explore the distribution and accumulation of housing prices in the space. Gangshan and Qiaotou area Metro Stations range of 800 meters and 600 meters, the Metro Stations for the impact of housing prices.Last use of the hedonic price method, the calculation of each attribute variable for housing price, and then analyzes the Kaohsiung Metro in the past four years for the attainment of the Kaohsiung City Gangshan and Qiaotou areas housing prices. The results show that, year after year to view the 2007-2010 Houses in the spatial distribution of change and the price of spatial correlated,known houses in more at the train station around the business aeras, with the Metro Stations operating, Houses in the beginning to the Metro Stations around distribution.Housing prices are significantly spatial correlated.Higher housing prices are concentrated around Metro stations in inner business aeras while lower housing prices are concentrated around stations in outskirt areas.There is no significant difference among Gangshan and Qiaotou areas regarding the effect of Metro stations on adjacent housing prices.In conclusion, the MRT System will upgrading the degree of regional development, but will vary the conditions of the regions, not play a most important key to enhance the conditions of housing prices in all regions. The contribution of this study is to figure out the changes in the spatial allocation of housing prices adjacent to Kaohsiung Metro Stations and to compare their differences among Gangshan and Qiaotou areas. The results would be useful to guide to homebuyers as well as real estate developers in their investment decision making.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Improvement Of Transient Stability For Power System With PV Generation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wang, Chingkai
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: STATCOM
PV Generation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: (Photovoltaic, PV)PSS/EPVPV(DG)(Static Synchronous Compensator, STATCOM)STATCOMPV

This thesis investigates the power quality analysis and recommendations on improvement strategies for independent power system with diesel generators and photovoltaic (PV) system. First, the principle of PV system is introduced and the corresponding mathematical model is developed to represent the output power of PV system as function of solar irradiation and surface temperature of PV panels. In this thesis, the Kinmen power system is selected for computer simulation using PSS/E software. The impact of intermittent PV generation due to variation of solar irradiation to power system voltage and frequency is investigated. The maximum PV capacity which is allowed to be integrated in the study power system by considering the constraint of system transient stability. Finally, the Static Synchronous Compensator (STATCOM) is considered to be applied to provide fast reactive power compensation for voltage regulation control to enhance the transient stability of isolated power system with high concentration of PV installation.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: THe Estimations Of the Physical Properties Of Steel Bar By Modified Neural Network
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lin, Yuan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Neural Network
Steel Bar
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The steel bar is the most important material in engineering constructions. Its quality is requested particularly stringently. The quality of steel bar not only affects the structure of construction, but also relates to the safeties of building and humans life. According to the policy set by government, the disqualified steel bars must be melted and cannot be sold. Generally, the control parameters of bars manufacturing process are set by the technician with full experiences. However, the disqualified steel bar is still easily produced, if the control parameters of manufacturing process are just set in accordance with the experiences. Undoubtedly, the cost of steel company will be increased due the defect productions. In this research, the estimations of steel bars properties by using modified neural network are proposed. Based on the learning capability of neural network, the nonlinear, complex relationships among the steel bar, the billet materials and the control parameters of production could be automatically developed. Such an artificial smart estimator then can help the technician to set the relevant control parameters of bars manufacturing process. In our studies, the estimation of steel bar will be executed based on the size. All estimations will be compared with each other and then discussed.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Heart Sound Signals Segmentation And Features Extraction
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Chen, Michelle
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Digital Heart Sounds Signal Process
Envelope
STFT
CWT
DWT
HHT
Feature Extraction
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: MATLAB3M555(Envelope)(Short Time Fourier Transform, STFT)(Continuous Wavelet Transform, CWT)(Discrete Wavelet Transform, DWT)(HilbertHuang Transform, HHT)5(Threshold)(Peak)HHT83.392(Cross-Correlation)(Detail Coefficients)

In this paper, we write a program of heart sounds segmentation using MATLAB software, and extract features from a single heartbeat cycle that has been segmented. The heart sounds for segmentation and feature extraction are recorded by the stethoscope that sold by 3M Company. We compare five methods that are used to process heart sound signals, and confirm that which method has a higher accuracy rate in the implementation of heart sounds segmentation. The 5 methods are Envelope, Short Time Fourier Transform, Continuous Wavelet Transform, Discrete Wavelet Transform and HilbertHuang Transform, respectively. The heart sounds process by these five methods and pass through a final-selection procedure to identify each first heart sound of heart sound signals, and then we can segment heart sounds into a single heartbeat cycle. The final-selection procedure can automated segment heart sounds into a single heartbeat cycle by setting of the Threshold and the minimum distance between Peaks. After heart sounds process by HHT and implement the final-selection procedure, we got the highest accuracy rate of heart sounds segmentation is 83.39%. Then we compared the two methods of features extraction of a single heartbeat cycle. In order to confirm which method of feature extraction is better, we use Cross-Correlation to observe whether these features are representative. The result is that, the feature of a single heartbeat cycle that obtained by the second method of feature extraction with the sixth detail coefficients is more representative.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Design Of PWM-Based Voltage Controllers For DC-DC Buck Converters
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wu, Kang
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: PWMMatlab / Simulink

A PWM-based phase-lead voltage controller is proposed for a switched buck converter. It is well known that switched buck converter is a nonlinear system that requires a nonlinear controller. In this thesis, a systematic controller design for buck converter. MATLAB/SIMULINK is proposed based on linearized model for a nonlinear buck converter. This phase-lead controller, as an example, is designed to demonstrate the advantages of fast simulation. The theory of switch mode power supply has been widely investigated in literature, but most papers have focused on the theoretical aspects of control rather than practical implementations. This paper presents a systematic design procedure to link the theory to practical power supply design procedure. This implementation design can generate the controlled pulse width modulation, then dominate switching status of the duty cycle in buck DC power supply, and the output voltage is satisfactory The proposed simple practical methodology to model a control circuit has been demonstrated by MATLAB/Simulink and has achieved the satisfactory results.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Study Of The Maintenance History System In Naval Electronic Equipment
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wang, Yungchih
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Since the establishment of Taiwan's Military Lean Model to streamline resources, it has become increasingly important to institute excellent electronic records that would enhance the efficiency of their use. This research will establish a computer program to help the Navy better implement the Lean Model. Through a systematic and complete documentation of each equipment's purchase record, maintenance history, and utilization, all data will be accurately recorded, processed, and analyzed . This program will enhance the proper and full utilization of the equipment's useful life cycle.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Effects Of Extrinsic Cues On The Relationship Between Brand Image And Purchasing Intention-Evidences From Chinese Exchange Students' Perspectives
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sun, Jenting
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Brand Image
Extrinsic Cues
Purchasing Intention
Chinese Student
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the 21st century today, tea is getting more and more attention due to its healthy function with the changing of consuming structures and higher living standard. According to the Council of Agriculture of Taiwans research (2009), there are over 60 countries that plant tea, and there are over 160 countries that purchase and consume tea, more over, there are over 20 billion people around the world that consume tea and the number is continually growing. According to Ministry of Education in Taiwan, there are a lot of China students come for traveling and studying in a short period, and these students will be trend in the future. Base on that, this is a study of the effects of extrinsic cues on the relationship between brand image and purchasing intentionevidences from Chinese exchange students perspectives. This study will take the exchange students from Mainland China in I-shou University as samples. The total number of the samples is 171. Based on brand image, purchasing intention, and extrinsic cues, we conducted descriptive statistics, reliability test, factor analysis, Pearson product-moment correlation coefficient analysis, scalar regression, one-way ANOVA and independent sample t test, and concluded as follows: (1) Brand image of Taiwanese tea has significantly impact on purchasing intention. (2) Extrinsic cues have significantly varieties on purchasing intention. (3) Extrinsic cues disturb significantly between brand image and purchasing intention. In addition, the study provided explanation for the results as well as its application. Further suggestions include: (1) Highlight the Quality of Taiwanese Tea and Mental Feeling after Purchasing. (2) Make the products lighter and aluminum cans as first choice. (3) Match Products with Selling Strategy.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Study On The Success Model Of Accounting Information Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Liu, Taiyi
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Accounting Information Systems
Safety Quality
Information System Success Model
Technology Acceptance Model
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: DeLone McLean (2003) Davis (1989) 14348% Cronbachs

The majority of companies and businesses rely on accounting information systems AIS to deal with the accounting matters. The AISs are very important tools for the companies and the businesses to do their jobs and to make decisions. However, the pros and cons of AISs will affect the effectiveness and the efficiency of the users to use the AISs. Therefore, it is a must to measure the efficiency and the effectiveness of using the AISs. This study mainly investigate the information systems success model (DeLone & McLean, 2003) and technology acceptance model (Davis, 1989), and the study will introduce a safety quality dimension into our developed accounting information systems model. The purpose of this study will also be to realize that how the dimensions of the information quality, the system quality, the service quality, and the safety quality influence the effectiveness and the efficiency of the users when using the AIS, and in turn, that how the effectiveness and the efficiency satisfy the users due to the successful AISs. A total of 143 questionnaires, with a valid rate about 48%, are collected in the study. The study uses the Cronbach's Alpha value to confirm the reliability of our questionnaires, and use the factor analysis to validate them. Following, we use the regression analysis to study the relationships among the constructs of our AIS model. From the results of the statistical analysis, the study conclude that the system users consider the system quality exerts the most influence on the effectiveness and the efficiency of the AISs, and follow in order by the service quality, the safety quality and the system quality; in addition, the study find that an effective and efficient AIS could positively satisfy the system users. Finally, the study results also support the inclusion of safety quality as an independent dimension into the studys AIS model.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Study On The Influence Of The Web Quality Upon The Repurchase Intention Of The Web-Customers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lin, Miaorong
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Website Quality
Trust
Consumer Satisfaction
Repurchase Intention
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: E-commerce has been becoming a more popular way for the business to sale its products to the customers. Therefore, more attention is needed for the e-commerce website to maintain and increase the consumers repurchase intention in this very competitive electronic commerce environment. In this study, starting from investing the quality issues concerning with the e-commerce website, we further explore the inter-relationships among the consumer satisfaction, the trust and the repurchase intention. The results indicate that the system quality, the information quality, the online service, the off-line service and the virtual community quality significantly and positively affect the satisfaction of the website-shoppers; the Information quality the off-line services and the virtual community quality are significant positive factors of the trust; the consumer satisfaction and the trust are important factors which affect the repurchase intention of the shoppers. However, it would be worth to note that the off-line service is the most influential factor which affects the customers satisfaction and trust. The results of this study may help the managers of the e-commerce to manage their websites more effectively and more efficiently, to increase the repurchase intention of the web-shoppers, and to maintain the competitiveness in business. In addition, we also expect that this study may contribute some insight into the future study in this academic area.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kano
The Study Of Marketing Strategy Of The Theme Park Based On The Kano Model And Product Life Cycle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wang, Longwei
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Kano
Kano Model
Product Life Cycle
Theme Park
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Kano

This study uses the Kano model and product life cycle theory to produce the quality el-ements and product life cycle questionnaire. In this study, the product life cycle questionnaire uses self-report scale with word descriptions, as opposed to quantifiable numbers in past studies. The results show that most of the theme park rides have no differences in terms of quality, suggesting that visitors' attitudes to the rides are passive. However, conclusions can be drawn according to analysis of different identities (middle school, high school, college, graduate students, and the employed). 1.The younger the visitor, the stronger the presence of the Kano model. 2.The younger the visitor, the stronger the preference for the rides, and vice versa. 3.Different identities of visitors have significantly different preferences for quality ele-ments and the product life cycle. 4.Visitors of different genders do not have significantly different preferences for quality elements and the product life cycle.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Applying The Para-social Presence Theory To Develop And Examine The Network Advertisement Value Model
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Zheng, Yiting
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Network Advertisement
Network Advertisement Value
Network Advertisement Attitude
Para-social Presence Theory
Purchase Intention
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: With the proliferation of the Internet, it makes advertisement diversely and virtualization. Comparing to traditional advertising, network advertisement is a more interactive and anthropomorphic way to communicate with consumers. Therefore, the design of the network advertisement for attracting consumers and expand the advertising effectiveness are main concerns for advertising agency. According to the related issues about advertising, drawing on the network advertisement value model, this present research integrated the factors drawing from Para-social Presence theory. We aim to investigate the effects of important antecedents on the value of the network advertisement, network advertising attitude toward brand, and consumers purchase intentions. The respondents who experienced with online advertisement were investigated, and the data was used to validate the research framework and hypotheses. Finally, the results of this study show that the evaluation of consumer value for network advertisement depended on whether the characteristics of network advertisement to meet consumer needs or not. That is, the acceptance of network advertisement for a consumer has impact on his/her attitude and purchase intention. Therefore, advertisers must have a consumer-oriented standpoint for providing relevant product information to meet consumers demands in order to achieve the goals of network advertisement marketing.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A New Dynamic Model Of Performance Measurement On Industrial Technology Commercialization Management
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lu, Yaojen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Technology Commercialization Management
Dynamic Performance Measures
Balanced Scorecard
Performance Improvement Solution
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Due to the fast development on global economic changes and recession, the management of industrial technology commercialization becomes an important issue for most business to take. According to several literature surveys, it is little relevant research has been found. In this paper we propose a new dynamic model of performance measurement on Industrial Technology Commercialization Management. In this research, we construct a performance index set, which includes four parts: customer commercialization criteria, technology commercialization managements 12 items of key skill, four dimensions of performance measurement guidelines of Balanced Score Card and some relevant literature. Respectively, according to the six stages management process of the performance indicators requirements, we categorized the various index with Plan , Do and Check in each stage. We provide performance evaluation matrix, improve policy suggestion chart as dynamic cycle tools. In this research we also propose an algorithm with five steps, which is called as a new dynamic model of performance measurement on Industrial Technology Commercialization Management.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copywriting And Brand Awareness On The Amount Of Consumer Memory
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jin, Youn
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Commercial Slogan
Pun
Brand Awareness
Consumers Memory
Brand Attitude
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: (/) X (/) ELM (elaboration likelihood model) (ANOVA)

This research applies empirical approach, of which the purpose is to find out how both commercial pun slogan and brand awareness could affect consumers' memory toward the advertisement. If a particular commercial slogan could successfully grab consumers' attention, then it will strengthen consumers memory and ability to recall a particular advertisement, product, or brand. ELM (elaboration likelihood model) was utilized by this study to imply the interrelated effect of commercial slogan (pun/general) and brand awareness (high/low level) on consumers memory. All collected data are analyzed and statistical hypothesis tested through various methods, which includes (a) descriptive statistics, (b) analysis of variance (ANOVA), and (c) regression analysis. Limitations of the study are also provided. This result from this study proves that consumers are definitely attracted by commercial pun slogan. Therefore, this study suggests that companies should input more effort in creating strong advertising materials, in order to better impress consumers and to well distinguish own brand to others. If brands with high level of awareness can create large market share through advertising, on the other hand, companies and brands with low awareness should definitely make a good sales pitch by marketing through advertising
